Review.Titre: Terrible
Review.Contenu: TerribleShipment due on Dec.5, received it on Dec.18Had to spend time and energy to get news on what’s going on with UPS and with MimeoMimeo very disappointing on solutionIn addition I receive my albums damaged on upper left corner and Mimeo offres as compensation 30% on my next order! Joke, not onay a discount on next order but send me black my albums NOT DAMAGED or refund those, Logic So as you see a very bad trip

Review.Titre: We had 2 photo projects on the go
Review.Contenu: We had 2 photo projects on the go. The 3 calendars finally arrived but were 4 days AFTER DHL said they would arrive!! And the tracking information at DHL is terrible in that they rarely give you up dates.My guess is that you moved ago DHL from FedEx (who were excellent!) as a cost saving measure. The problem is that DHL is antagonizing long term customers (such as us) and running the risk of losing them to another photo service. Not worth the cost savings!!

Review.Titre: Not as good as before
Review.Contenu: The delivery was almost one week later than it was said when I placed the order.The printing quality isn't as good as it was.  Even I have upgraded my shooting gear, there is noise on the printed photos which I have never seen before.

Review.Titre: The pictured were NOT printed…
Review.Contenu: The pictures were NOT printed correctly.   They were cropped and the coloring was only adequate.   I am very disappointed and do NOT recommend mimeo at all.

Review.Titre: Charged in UK currency
Review.Contenu: While the calendars are lovely, you charged me in GBP.  I live in Canada.  There was no way to change the currency on your website.  Can you please explain why?

Review.Titre: Why is MIMEO keeping me in the dark?
Review.Contenu: I paid for two albums but I didn't get receipt, yet the changes were still made against my bank account.Clearly your software workflow is faulty needs to be corrected. CHARGES SHOULD ONLY BE MADE AFTER THE RECEIPT IS SENT.Now Just today the two albums have arrived but I never received any notification of intention to deliver, nor tracking information. Nor did I receive any answers from MIMEO when I made my first complaint.

Review.Titre: Mimeo was good to deal with and the…
Review.Contenu: Mimeo was good to deal with and the items were produced well, but the DHL delivery service was abysmal. No words adequately describe how poor they were to deal with.They email with conflicting advice regularly, indicating they have the wrong address, despite it being correct on all three items we ordered and we would have to pick them up at one of their depots, despite paying for home delivery. They also said that they had tried to deliver two of them, despite us being home all of the day. The Canadian lady I spoke to had no idea how Canadian addresses were organized. I cannot use Mimeo again if they use DHL to deliver items as it is too frustrating. I would not be surprised if DHL is not delivering packages much longer as they seem to be struggling.

Review.Titre: Wal Calendar
Review.Contenu: Wal CalendarThe Quality is OK,, But the pricing is far to high and not competitive in the market place,I will order the Calendar next year from another company,,

Review.Titre: At first I order from apple and the…
Review.Contenu: At first I order from apple and the calendars looked good for many years, then with Mimeo, the quality began to drop. The Calendars is too dark but ok. Now I ordered a book and it is so dark I just want to throw it away. And they actually sent me another copy, that was suposed to be better, but looks exactly the same. I´m a photographer and used to see my pictured edited, So the problem is not my pictures.

Review.Titre: You cannot have more than one project…
Review.Contenu: You cannot have more than one project in your basket. Therefore you will have to pay freight for each project actually up to 50% of my order. Other suppliers can do this. I only got a bad excuse asking the chat for help. And for Denmark the freight is around 100 DKK per parcel.

Review.Titre: Don't bother ...
Review.Contenu: I ordered prints and the books and I have to say the prints came back with horrible colors.  The outfits in all the photos looked completely off and the entire print had a red tint to it.  I e-mailed the company (not for refund or anything, but to just let them know) and no one even bothered to reply back to my e-mail.  In a world where such companies are a dime a dozen, I would not use Mimeo ever again.

Review.Titre: Front cover was totally crooked
Review.Contenu: Front cover was totally crooked. Inside pics were fine. Coloring was off and really bummed about the front. Looks cheap and off center.

Review.Titre: DEFECTIVE
Review.Contenu: On Nov 17 I wrote to you about a defective order and attached a photo of the defect, which was that one of the pages was printed upside down. I have not heard a single word yet from your company about the resolution. Here is the original email:Good afternoon.One of the three copies I order was defective when it was delivered today. The last page of one copy was inserted upside down. The Mimeo Photos Order is 1057522. I have attached a shot of the page that is a problem. Please send me only one new copy.  Thank you. Lora Barrett

Review.Titre: I’m very happy with the product but I’m…
Review.Contenu: I’m very happy with the product but I’m still missing two orders. On top of that I am unable to establish an account with you. I keep resetting my password but the system says it’s invalid with no info to fix it. I did get an email response saying he was going to check with shipping. But no resolution yet. How do I contact you if I can’t establish an account?

Review.Titre: Disconformida
Review.Contenu: Good Afternoon.The truth is that I have very good references from more than 20 books that I have from you, but I have a disagreement in the way I can contact you.Las October I placed an order for a duplicate book by mistake, there was no way to cancel it, so I have 2 identical books with double cost.I just needed to be able to cancel an order, very difficult? but I do not know how.Excuse my English, it is a Google translation.Greetings.

Review.Titre: It wasn't completely user friendly
Review.Contenu: It wasn't completely user friendly. But what is more important is I'm being asked to review my experience about products I still haven't received. So I don't know what they look like yet.

Review.Titre: Can't contact MimeoPhotos
Review.Contenu: You delivered another order to our address.  No way to contact MimeoPhotos to correct situation!

Review.Titre: Did not receive package after more than 2 weeks
Review.Contenu: I still have not received my package after several weeks. Ideally I would like to see my money returned. The event for which I wanted to offer it as a gift has long passed by now. The experience seems to be the same as when I ordered something last time in March 2023. Then it took 16 days for delivery by UPS rather than the estimated standard shipping of 9-11 days. It was mentioned then that you would take up the issue with UPS to avoid slow delivery in the future, but in the mean time the delivery still seems slow. Again I've been waiting for 15 days already and still received nothing.

Review.Titre: Spent MONTHS making my wedding album
Review.Contenu: Spent MONTHS making my wedding album. I decided i wanted to then make it a hard cover in a slightly larger size.   The message on screen when choosing this, read that i could undo it if i was unhappy with it.  Turns out, it DELETED ALL of the images and theres nothing I can do.  Undo is inaccessible.   Start from scratch was the advice from MIMEO.... My advice, don't use them!

Review.Titre: A disappointing experience
Review.Contenu: I had a simple card made but never received it.  Had to request another one be made and sent.  Still waiting.  This should have been sent by USPS and not UPS in my opinion.  I have had other projects done with them and have received good service and nicely produced products.  But I believe this company has gone downhill I'm sorry to say.

Review.Titre: impossible to order a photo with a…
Review.Contenu: impossible to order a photo with a frame on your website

Review.Titre: The book fell apart when unpacked
Review.Contenu: The book fell apart when unpacked. Had to prove this, which we did. Book shipped a week ago and has not arrived. Checked delivery status and it says, "delivery status unavailable" which usually means "lost".This is very frustrating.

Review.Titre: Shipping
Review.Contenu: I have 30 different folded cards and when I reorder they are shipped to one at a time with a separate shipping charge for each. They should be bulked into one package with one shipping charge.

Review.Titre: Delayed and disappointing
Review.Contenu: Delayed delievery. Low quality. Does not match the sales pitch in the app. I do not understand that Apple has replaced its own brilliant photobook service in Photos with this. I usually never write reviews, especially not bad ones. But this was disappointing.

Review.Titre: Delivery cost unacceptable
Review.Contenu: Price for delivery and tax are way too high. Delivery firm only tried to deliver package once and then didn’t give exact instructions where the packages had to be picked up. My 90 year old father was completely stressed !!!

Review.Titre: I have not yet received my order
Review.Contenu: I have not yet received my order. Your team is  trying to resolve the issue. The package is in UPS Center (Eindhoven) since April 15th. So, if one day I receive my 5 albums, I could give my opinion about quality 😇 My advice: change carrier!

Review.Titre: Terrible after sale service
Review.Contenu: Terrible after sale service. After 20 days I did not receive the photo album ordered. I asked why is stopped in Netherlands but till now no answer. Absolutely to forgot. Apple photo service used years ago was  another planet.

Review.Titre: Worts International Delivery
Review.Contenu: I haven’t received my book because you sent the invoice with a price of 1,074 usd instead of 1,074 Mexican pesos so customs won’t let DHL deliver the product until we pay more taxes. I contacted your team and haven’t gotten a solution.

Review.Titre: I am a long standing customer and…
Review.Contenu: I am a long standing customer and recently the photo album I ordered had a photo which was not the standard of Mimeo.The colour was wrong.I use a Cannon 500 camera of a good standard.I am unable to make contact with anyone in Mimeo.

Review.Titre: …Worst Customer service EVER - non-existent.
Review.Contenu: You have no customer service to talk to.  Your Email is a joke, I've sent 4 and have only gotten a bot to respond.  I spent $300 on an order, paid for express shipping and you have no idea where it is, when it'll arrive and no one to talk to.  I just talked to a lady at Mimeo, she said she gets these calls all day long. Trying to cancel order! Worst customer service EVER!

Review.Titre: Holiday photos
Review.Contenu: When making the book, it continually crashed. I spoke to a technician who said try and finalise the book delete then re download the Mimeo App. The book is finally done and has arrived. The print book colour  is extremely flat, noticeably in the flesh tones. When looking at the actual photo in comparison to the printed pages, there is no comparison. Everything looks dark.

Review.Titre: I ordered one book just to make sure it…
Review.Contenu: I ordered one book just to make sure it was what I wanted, went back to my book they had taken four pictures out, and I had to redo my book to order eight more books! I don’t care if the pictures were blurry or not my book could’ve should have stayed the same and no pictures should’ve been removed!

Review.Titre: I had to do my project over 3 times…
Review.Contenu: I had to do my project over 3 times because I did not click the "autofill" before I spent hours selecting my photos for a project, for example!! One time my project was deleted becuase I deleted ONE picture from the project and without asking if I wanted to delete the entire project... my project was gone and I had to start over again...!!! This is not a user friendly software at all! I will not be using Mimeo for next year's Chrismas calendars...

Review.Titre: It was an ordeal
Review.Contenu: It was an ordeal.  I have used Mimeo for years, and this was a terrible experience.The app would not load my photos into the calendar app, and it was not clear why not.  I had a lot of trouble connecting to someone to help me, and they couldn't explain what was wrong or how to fix it.  I ended up starting all over, and it was incredibly frustrating and difficult.  If you had someone I could talk to who knows the program, it would have made all the difference!

Review.Titre: Shipping issues- almost a month since…
Review.Contenu: Shipping issues- almost a month since order was placed. No help from customer service. Replacement order sent. No tracking available for that one either. If I needed this as a gift I would have been more disappointed. Still waiting!

Review.Titre: Had problems with picture not appearing…
Review.Contenu: Had problems with picture not appearing in “preview” mode, yet was in the edit mode. Emailed for help, they had me delete, reinstall, yada yada, didn’t work, had to just use different pics. Then at checkout, I kept getting an error, when I signed out of my account, I could check out. Jeesh!! Waaaaaaay too difficult. Never again.

Review.Titre: Threw the Calendars in the Garbage
Review.Contenu: Very poor functionality. Can’t preview layouts. Limited ability to add pics to individual dates. If you make a major obvious mistake they will take your money and print it anyway.  Zero Quality Control, and no interest from their staff to catch anything obvious. Brutal customer service. Too bad, so sad, don’t use Mimeo.

Review.Titre: The check out process is horrible
Review.Contenu: The check out process is horrible. It took me over an hour to check out. The upload kept failing then working with support I had to do a pdf that did not give me confidence that the project was being ordered correctly. I like your product but the check out process was so bad I don’t know if I can order from you again

Review.Titre: I purchased 3
Review.Contenu: I purchased 3, 8" x 8" soft bound photo books.  Each book has approximately 34 pages, Cost was about $100 each.  After a few page turnings the books are all falling apart from the inadequate book binding. Very disappointed.

Review.Titre: 16 days and no order received!
Review.Contenu: I placed an order on Oct. 9th, amd it's the 25th and I haven't received it yet!!! I contacted Mimeo twice by emailz and I did get a prompt reply only to tell me both times that they wpuld assing someone to get back to me with a delivery date.This is for a birthday gift, and I needed it by Oct 27th....I definitely won't order anything from Mimeo again.

Review.Titre: I've lost count how many emails I've…
Review.Contenu: I've lost count how many emails I've received from Mimeo for promotional offers. Now that I wanted to place an order none of the promotional offers worked. What's the point of letting you flood my inbox with countless emails only to not be able to use any of the offers when I actually need them?

Review.Titre: Not delivered; refund eventually
Review.Contenu: I spent hours preparing an album for an important birthday. They charged me the 300e for the multiple albums then missed the delivery deadline. Two full months later of email correspondence, I finally get an email to say they will make a refund. They should not be allowed trade on Apple. Disgraceful experience. Avoid.

Review.Titre: Beware
Review.Contenu: I am using an old Mac OS - 10.13.6 (which is no longer supported by Apple). When I downloaded the latest Mimeo update 5.3 I could not upload my photographs from Photos. After extensive web chats I was told to uninstall 5.3 and was sent 5.2 to upload as a ‘workaround’, this failed to work. Consequently I have lost some ten projects (Photobooks), this is most disappointing and frustrating as I have used Mimeo for a number of years and have previously been most satisfied.I feel that there should have been some warning regarding updating to 5.3, it would then have been my choice.

Review.Titre: I wanted to change my Christmas card…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to change my Christmas card shortly after I ordered it.  Different people emailed me to say no changes could be made even though my order was not processed.  I redid the card the following day which put receiving my order 4 days later (after Christmas.). I asked for both orders to be sent together on the earlier date.  No promises made to do that.  It seems there is no customer service which I expect with a company that is more expensive than many others and has high shipping and handling fees.  I most likely will choose another company next year.

Review.Titre: Very delayed delivery
Review.Contenu: Very delayed delivery. It was sent out on 2/8/2023. Up to now, it hasn't arrived yet. Fedex keeps changing the estimated delivery date (initially at 2/15, then changed to 2/21, then changed to 2/24). Not sure what instructions Mimeo provided to Fedex for such delay but this is discouraging from me from making future orders with Mimeo.

Review.Titre: I was just very disappointed in how the…
Review.Contenu: I was just very disappointed in how the cards looked. Also, I thought they were folding cards, not a postcard. I ordered new ones at Walgreens and loved how they came

Review.Titre: Projects not delivered
Review.Contenu: Well I still have not received either project, one sent to you sept 2 …And the other sept 9…I had an email to say they were on their way… but they do not show up in the tracking app!   BOth of them were estimated to be here by now.  The company responded to this and rectified the problem…. Thank you Deb

Review.Titre: Item never arrived in spite of UPS…
Review.Contenu: Item never arrived in spite of UPS marking as delivered on tracking. I’ve complained, and have received a response from mimeo to say they will deal with queries in the order received, but this is a Christmas gift for very elderly relatives, so time is of the essence.

Review.Titre: Bad integration of Mimeo in Apple Photos…
Review.Contenu: The integration of Mimeo in Apple photos did not work at all!I tried multiple times to upload my project; >10 times unsuccessful!Finally I got advised to download it as a pdf and upload manually… that worked but not as expected :-(Thanks for the feedback Mimeo; so far I’ve not yet experienced the app. As soon as I see an opportunity I’ll give it a try and update the review on that opportunity.

Review.Titre: Exorbitant shipping charges!
Review.Contenu: Although the calendars are great and so easy to use with a Mac, the cost of shipping the projects is terrible.  I made 5 different projects and had to ship them all independently.  This is close to $80 just in shipping costs.  Not to mention that shipping one calendar shouldn't cost 16.99....heavy packages from across the world cost less than that!  I have asked about this before and the answer is always that "we are working on it"!  It's been years, surely the company can figure out how to group projects going to the same address.  I was trying to save money this year by making presents!!!

Review.Titre: Every year it gets more difficult
Review.Contenu: Every year when I make calendars for my family there is some additional “feature” that makes the process more arduous than the previous year. For example, it used to be possible to import a calendar with birthdays and anniversaries. That disappeared. Each event now needs to be manually entered. The font size needs to be changed one at a time instead of a global setting. Because I ship 6 calendars to multiple locations, each address needs to be entered manually. It would be nice to maintain a database to select from.

Review.Titre: Discount code
Review.Contenu: Did use the offer on your site, 15% discount, thinking that was the best I could get. However, after signing up for your newsletter I get a 27% discount code, this being too late as I already ordered the 220 dollar photo book from you, very disappointed.

Review.Titre: I really miss Apple photo book service
Review.Contenu: I really miss Apple photo book service. Your software is clunky, not intuitive, restrictive and the best designs Apple used to offer are gone for good. Your fonts are hideous!Apple is such a constant disappointment as they sell off good services and refuse to listen to the customer base that used to love Apple. It’s either take what we give you, overpay and do it our way or f- off. Mimeo is a reminder of that. What used to be awesome and easy is now just a restrictive pain in the ass. Here’s an idea, leave the software alone so we don’t have to re-learn it every time a book needs to be created and ordered.

Review.Titre: Easy to use but bad result!
Review.Contenu: Very easy to use but really disappointed about the result!!! I use it each year for calendar and christmas card but this year the quality is really bad. Pictures are not well placed, the paper quality and pictures quality are really bad! Sad!

Review.Titre: Incredibly frustrating experience!!!  I have made your books for years…
Review.Contenu: I have made your books for years (before that Apple), but this is my worst experience ever!!!  My three books turned out well, but I had endless frustrations in making them.  My teaching partner saved the day by telling me the very simplest of steps which corrected the problem.  That was after I had had many many "chats" with an expert who simply kept offering me printed Q&A's to read!  If I had been able to speak with a human being the problem would have been solved in less than five minutes.  As it was I spent three days making two books because of this simple glitch.  It there was another choice I would definitely use another company which allowed me the opportunity to speak with a human being like it was in the old days!  There is nothing that can replace human contact, and I may use Shutterfly from here on out.

Review.Titre: Not received my photo book yet
Review.Contenu: Not received my photo book yet. Cannot contact courier despite numerous attempts. Missed the date for this to be given as a present for my child’s birthday! Very disappointing!!

Review.Titre: I ordered a book which arrived after…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a book which arrived after the date for a birthday - quality is ok. Service disappointing for the price

Review.Titre: Repeated Delivery Failure
Review.Contenu: Hello,I just sent the message below to help at mimeophotos.com complaining about repeated delivery failure on a package by UPS========================================Hello,I am writing to follow up on delivery of a Photo-Calendar order from Mimeo which has been fraught with problems going back to Feb 22nd! Based on the shipping history as documented below, it seems there have been many issues in delivering the calendar.  Initially, the calendar was not delivered as no one was home.  For future delivery, I then gave explicit instructions to leave the package at the door (if no one answers) but still the calendar has not been delivered!I am very frustrated as the calendar has still not been delivered.  Can you please do what it takes to deliver the calendar asap.Sincerely,

Review.Titre: Probably will never use Mimeo again
Review.Contenu: Probably will never use Mimeo again.  A simple order for two prints seemed to be lost, and not delivered.  Also no updates on my orders from Mimeo. I suggest you take your business elsewhere.

Review.Titre: Package has not arrived
Review.Contenu: Package has not arrived. It is a memorial book for my husband who passed away. Very disappointed.  Emails say you are looking. Really upset that book was not tracked appropriately.

Review.Titre: Disappointed to learn that the 72% off…
Review.Contenu: Disappointed to learn that the 72% off Valentine Day offer when orderingr two or more items did not apply to the folded photo cards with envelopes. Trying to place the order for the photo card was difficult and confusing. I was trying to order a folding card with the photo on the outside and the inside blank. I ended up abandoning the effort unsuccessfully.

Review.Titre: it’s absurd to change $5 (or whatever…
Review.Contenu: it’s absurd to change $5 (or whatever it was) for shipping a $2.50 card. ridiculous! the shipping is so expensive it’s a joke. just charge more for the damn card and don’t charge anything for shipping or charge something reasonable. i mean, i wonder if you are even aware of what you are charging? because it seems impossible to believe that you would think your shipping charges are a good idea. like was that a part of the business plan? normally i wouldn’t even bother to respond but it is so crazy that i’m taking the time to tell you. i will not continue to use your services because there are plenty of choices that don’t charge nearly twice the amount of the card itself for shipping.

Review.Titre: Too much for shipping and slow
Review.Contenu: Program works good, but asking for a review right after charging me $12 for shipping and not having it out the next day sucks. If you charge that much in shipping you should be fast. I’ll not recommend this to anyone

Review.Titre: Not user friendly at all…
Review.Contenu: Spent hours doing a photo book from our trip overseas. Uploaded it and saved it. Then spent another couple of hours editing the same book for another friend.uploaded and paid also. Only to receive an email stating they had both failed afterwards. The platform has some major faults when trying to go back to make changes. After being told I could go back to last save by online chat, this is not the case. It will only go back a few changes. You also cannot rename project and save as different project which would have been a major helpAn update after your reply. The current version of Apple does not allow duplicates to be made and it most definitely does not allow you to rename. I think your platform needs a major overhaul with registration to Apple users. It’s a pity because the finished product is lovely quality.

Review.Titre: Horrible
Review.Contenu: HorribleShipment is first super expensive and not fast at allWhy photo are not printed in Singapore and send locallyThis is not good for the planet On top quality of the pictures is mediocre and shipment by Australia post way to long

Review.Titre: I contacted Mimeo several times about…
Review.Contenu: I contacted Mimeo several times about my order for my daughter's 9th birthday, as my tracking number wasn't working, as I was concerned that there was an error, especially as I paid a higher shipping fee to ensure on-time delivery for her special day. I was assured several times that my book was en route by Mimeo, despite the tracking number needing to be fixed. When the expected delivery date passed, I contacted Mimeo for the third time, inquiring about my delivery. Only after the third contact, Mimeo told me there was an "unexpected problem" with my tracking number and, therefore, they would ship me another order. I received my order one week after my daughter's birthday. I've always had a great experience with Mimeo. Still, this delay could have been avoided, and I am at a loss as to why I would pay a higher shipping cost only to receive my book a week later, especially when I contacted Mimeo when there seemed to be a problem with shipping from the get-go. I would love to get a refund on my expedited shipping costs, especially since this could have been avoided.

Review.Titre: The product hasn’t arrived.
Review.Contenu: The product hasn’t arrived.It was estimated for 18.10.23Today is 28.10.23Your customer service response was cut and paste.I am usually very happy with the product.

Review.Titre: I was stunned at the price of shipping
Review.Contenu: I was stunned at the price of shipping. Due to fact I needed the photos to complete a heritage project I had no choice but to pay 7 x the amount of the actual photos for shipping. The ease of ordering and quality of product is great. But to pay so much for shipping when two stamps on an envelope would have delivered the same high quality goods? Not for me! I will print my own.

Review.Titre: Late; has not arrived.
Review.Contenu: Estimated delivery 9/5.  It's 9/14 and has not arrived.  Perhaps you should not ask for feedback when the item is 1.5 weeks late and not yet delivered.

Review.Titre: Tried to re-order my card made on line
Review.Contenu: Tried to re-order my card made on line. Not able to access my account. Kept asking for new password.Even tried the help center. To no avail. So I decided the frustration is not worth it. I plan to make another thank you card and order from another site. Frustration.

Review.Titre: Incredibly disappointed
Review.Contenu: Incredibly disappointed. Pictures were pricey and are mostly resized cutting off and distorting the original pics. More clarification should have been given as how to size pics. certainly would never use this company again

Review.Titre: Promo Codes
Review.Contenu: I completed three projects on Sunday and placed the order Sunday evening. I ordered almost $2,000 of product and the very next morning you sent me a 20% discount code. Very disappointing.Maybe you can provide a credit against future orders?I appreciate your prompt response but I was hoping you might extend a credit given the timing of your promo code announcement.

Review.Titre: The phonebook arrived damaged
Review.Contenu: The phonebook arrived damaged - the bottom of the binding is dented as if someone dropped or smashed it on the ground. I am very disappointed and upset, as I was depending on this as a Valentine's gift.

Review.Titre: I have not received my product
Review.Contenu: I have not received my product. UPS did not deliver and they have not returned my emails asking when can they do it or where should I go pick it up.

Review.Titre: Book delivery fine.
Review.Contenu: Book delivery fine.I have asked about potential reduction in another book that I am about to orderAND IF THAT SATISFIES ME I WILL ORDER 4/5 MORE. 1) Can I get a discount? 2) if so I want the code or codes. Damn simply.No robot please.

Review.Titre: Poor Quality
Review.Contenu: The pictures in my book were all out of focus.  Still haven't resolved the issue.  They want my first born and I am having issues obtaining what they have requested.  Offered to send the book back, but not told where.   I have used you in the past and always been happy, not this time.

Review.Titre: I still have not received my photos
Review.Contenu: I still have not received my photos, which were ordered 3 weeks ago. Mimeo keeps sending me requests to review their service, which I can't recommend.

Review.Titre: I still have not received my album
Review.Contenu: I still have not received my album.  They said they had tried to deliver and left a card.  There was no card.  I emailed them and said please leave the parcel at our local post office.  They said they would look into it.  I have not heard back.  Album was expensive and this is very disappointing.  Susi Inglis

Review.Titre: The book hasn’t been delivered yet
Review.Contenu: The book hasn’t been delivered yet. Must admit staff were most helpful in tracing it. Still taking ages to deliver, Carole

Review.Titre: Wrong order followed up by poor…
Review.Contenu: Wrong order followed up by poor customer service and a repeated wrong order. Why bother?

Review.Titre: It took me an entire week to finally…
Review.Contenu: It took me an entire week to finally get my order properly placed.  Very frustrating and many emails later it finally happened.  I do appreciate your responses, however.

Review.Titre: I thought they would of edited it but…
Review.Contenu: I thought they would of edited it but they didn’t and I didn’t realize this but so now after 100$ some of the pictures are cut off and show black

Review.Titre: Had to returned my books they did y ho…
Review.Contenu: Had to returned my books they did y ho threw customs because you made the prive of 2400 dllrs instead of pesos

Review.Titre: Unreliable delivery of product
Review.Contenu: Software is good. Finished my project and shipped-3wks later it still hasn’t been delivered. If your product never gets delivered, what’s the point. Expensive.

Review.Titre: It’s been 2 weeks since order was sent
Review.Contenu: It’s been 2 weeks since order was sent.   Missed opportunity to capture post trip excitement.   Still waiting for delivery !!!

Review.Titre: Never received half my order
Review.Contenu: I ordered 5 wallet prints and 7 8x10 prints 2 weeks ago and I got the 5 wallet prints which are great but never received my 8x10 prints.

Review.Titre: I was notified of a promotional code…
Review.Contenu: I was notified of a promotional code that would reduce the cost of calendars I made by 23%. After repeatedly trying to input the code and getting a failed notice, I gave up. The promotion would have saved me up to $150.00. I will not use this product again.

Review.Titre: Photo book has arrived badly damaged…
Review.Contenu: Photo book has arrived badly damaged (crushed on one corner! Unacceptable, was going to offer as wedding anniversary present to my parents, paid over $150!!!

Review.Titre: You can only order one project at a…
Review.Contenu: You can only order one project at a time which forces you to have to pay more to ship each individual project. I will not use Mimeo again as this is not efficient use of shipping and costly overcharge.

Review.Titre: My parcel did not arrive on time
Review.Contenu: My parcel did not arrive on time.  It is over a week late and due to arrive June 14-15.  I will write another review once the parcel has arrived.

Review.Titre: I dont have my photobook delivery yet…
Review.Contenu: I dont have my photobook delivery yet and theres no delivery date either. Since april 26, i dont know what happen

Review.Titre: All the pictures on the book were dark
Review.Contenu: All the pictures on the book were extremely dark when the real pictures are not dark.I was very disappointed with the final product.

Review.Titre: The price was crazy expensive when I…
Review.Contenu: The price was crazy expensive when I was done $17.99 was the price.. paid $60.00.. over charge for delivery because I admit I needed the book for a birthday gift and was afraid  it would not arrive in time…I paid the upcharge and it was there the next couple of days kinda believe I didn’t need too…

Review.Titre: Unhelpful Customer Services
Review.Contenu: An issue I flagged with Mimeo's HelpDesk was escalated by them to Customer Services, whose response was neither timely, well-considered, nor helpful.

Review.Titre: Still waiting g for customer service to…
Review.Contenu: Still waiting g for customer service to call me back. I placed two orders only received an confirmation email for one. Link to help on website doesn’t work. Found customer service number on a complaint website. Called and no one has called me back.

Review.Titre: poor results with many under exposed…
Review.Contenu: poor results with many under exposed pictures

Review.Titre: Great product just can't understand why…
Review.Contenu: Great product just can't understand why you have to ripe everybody off on shipping. There is no reason you can't get three books shipped at the same time and in the same package. Very sad.

Review.Titre: I never received my card
Review.Contenu: Paid an outrageous amount for shipping. Card never even showed up. Nice one Mimeo 👍🏻

Review.Titre: Was an error in processing.
Review.Contenu: After receiving a message that there was an error in the processing of my order, I reached out for help from Mimeo.  Eventually I received 3 messages saying I was given 3 refunds.  I had ordered 8 calendars.  Which orders were being refunded????  I have no idea.  My family looks forward to their Christmas calendars which I’ve given for at least 10 years in a row.  This year, because of this incident, I have no idea whose calendar was cancelled and whose calendar is being made.  Furthermore, I have no idea what went wrong and if and how the problem can be resolved.  This is very distressing.  I hope I can somehow get some answers and the 3 cancelled calendars can be fixed.  I really need to TALK to an agent .

Review.Titre: Your web site makes it almost…
Review.Contenu: Your web site makes it almost impossible to find active projects. Multiple sign ins codes, ect

Review.Titre: Drips and splotches on my album
Review.Contenu: This is the second time I’ve ordered a photo album and the last few pages have drips and discolouration on them. The books are so expensive - I would expect someone would flip through them before sending them out. They reprinted it the last time - haven’t had time to complain about this one. Just a waste of time, resources and shipping.

Review.Titre: App just stopped working on Mac
Review.Contenu: Created my holiday cards as normal (done this for 8+ years now)and then the next day the software on my Mac stopped working. I uninstalled Nd reinstalled and it still doesn’t work anymore with Apple photos.

Review.Titre: Definitely not premium
Review.Contenu: I used to use Motif Photos (same quality as when Apple ran the service), but it was acquired by Mimeo Photos. The print quality now is terrible, and the feel of the hard-back album too. The only "premium" is the cost!

Review.Titre: The freight cost is way to high and if…
Review.Contenu: The freight cost is way to high and if you order a calender and a photo book you cannot combine them in one shipment

Review.Titre: Standard and Quality have dropped
Review.Contenu: I have been ordering calendars from Apple/ Mimeo for a number of years now. This year I felt that the print quality was poor and no envelope/ outer cover. I will probably order from Snapfish next year!

Review.Titre: You were fast turning my card orders…
Review.Contenu: You were fast turning my card orders around, but the quality of the prints, especially blue sky in m,y images on two different orders, was poor.   Very blotchy.  Quite disappointed.

Review.Titre: Disappointed
Review.Contenu: Not impressed by paper stock. 30 minute cancellation policy should be extended. Photos grainy and washed out.

Review.Titre: You used to have a calendar that had…
Review.Contenu: You used to have a calendar that had the date numbers the size of the square for the date. I needed for the seeing impaired, but you discontinued it when you took over from apple. Also I make 4 individual calendars every year and I have to pay separate shipping for each one, people have been asking for years to change that yet you won’t listen to us.

Review.Titre: I ordered prints and was very…
Review.Contenu: I ordered prints and was very disappointed in the quality.  They were inconsistent and overly saturated for the most part.  The images were shot by a professional photographer.

Review.Titre: Very difficult to edit.
It was disappointing Compared to previous orders
Review.Contenu: It was disappointing Compared to previous books. It was missing the written bits and a major photo of the ship.  The Title was not on the edge as previously.

Review.Titre: Shipping charges are ridiculous
Review.Contenu: Shipping charges are ridiculous.  Will not be using you again until you either have flat rate shipping, or actual shipping cost (not inflated from USPS)

Review.Titre: Unexplained Failure of Photo Book Project to Upload
Review.Contenu: My 102-page photo book would not upload.  Unfortunately, no explanation was given regarding the reason.  I tried 7 or 8 times to upload, with the same message popping up at the end of each 10-minute try:  "Sorry, we can't upload your project.  Try again."  After each attempt, I tried to correct my project by deleting pictures, deleting pages, rearranging page layouts, etc.  Nothing worked.  All this took 3-4 hours of wasted time.  I finally contacted customer service via e-mail (no opportunity for telephone contact was provided) and a helpful representative promptly explained how to send my project in using an alternative pdf method.  The explanation was complicated, however, so I put off trying it for several days.  When I did, it worked and the project turned out successfully.  While, as usual, I am very pleased with the final product, the entire experience was most frustrating.

Review.Titre: Expensive printing costs and the…
Review.Contenu: Expensive printing costs and the shipping is way over priced. I ordered prints online through a local CVS and the quality was just as good for a fraction of the cost.

Review.Titre: Calendar creation is more complicated than it needs to be
Review.Contenu: I always appreciate the good quality of the final product. However, the process of creating a calendar seems a little outdated. For instance, try to put a photo on a calendar page (the one with the dates, not the collage). Why does it need to be so complicated? In a former version (apple iPhotos some years ago) this worked just fine, in an intuitive way. What a pity that things get worse rather than better...

Review.Titre: Won't be using it again
Review.Contenu: First - you can't preview the themes and honestly they all look the same until you select one and play with it.Second:  NONE of you themes include complete boxes around the dateThird - well, that's as far as I got since I became so frustrated I just updated an old calendar made in Photo, and uploaded the completed PDF to Mimeo for printing (which has gotten ridiculously expensive especially with shipping added!)

Review.Titre: Transfer from Mac to Mimeo did not work!
Review.Contenu: I was very frustrated that I could not link the book I created on my Mac to Mimeo. All the photos were cut in 1/2 when it transferred. Changing the photo book size did not help. So, after 8 hours of work on the book and another 11/2 hrs with Mimeo consultants, who were not able to solve the problem, I started completely over. The new book turned out fine but it was not as nice as my original book.

Review.Titre: Your billing page wouldn’t work
Review.Contenu: Your billing page wouldn’t work - couldn’t even enter my name & email. So after making a calendar on the photos app (18th) I make one on the web version (safari on my Mac) - when only the credit card # couldn’t be entered. I chatted with ashmir- v helpful - but it appeared to be a system-wide problem. Force quitting didn’t work. Eventually, I got it done on web version via chrome. V Time consuming and bad for my blood pressure.

Review.Titre: I was not able to use the 27% coupon…
Review.Contenu: I was not able to use the 27% coupon offered to first time users.  I believe the same discount should be available to any user.  I purchased a calendar from you last year and two this year.  Customer loyalty should be worth at least the same as your deal for a new customer.  I'm afraid I won't be using Mimeo Photos for my calendar needs in the future.

Review.Titre: Not including GST in price is not fair
Review.Contenu: I did not like that I was charged a whole lot of extra costs once I'd completed my project - GST and delivery.  I think it is illegal in NZ to quote excluding GST.The end result was a really nice book which I'm pleased with but cost a lot more than I expected and probably could have got as good for the same price elsewhere

Review.Titre: Clunky
Review.Contenu: I’ve used the app for the past few years, but this year it didn’t work well.  Really hated that I couldn’t clear the selected picture section for the new project.  Web version was ok -  it was clunky, the edit photo features were lacking and I wanted the ability to include a page of text only.  All in all, it was frustrating rather than an enjoyable.

Review.Titre: this is no more a pleasure to make photo Albums with updated version of Mimeo
Review.Contenu: I am using Mimeo for more than 8 or 9 years. Recently I got problems and updated Mimeo application on my computer. For privacy, I am not transfering all my photos on cloud or open websites, this is my choice and this is the case for years.Why the upgraded version (2 months ago) lot of functions are no more available : I cannot change photos frame and change light, brillance, colors on the photos integrated in the book. To open the files is a nightmare, the path through "photoApplication" and "mimeo application" is never the same.So, this is no more smooth to use Mimeo tool to make photo books.Hopefully, the quality is good and printing and sending worked correctly.

Review.Titre: Not User Friendly
Review.Contenu: It is not user friendly compared to the previous photo book by apple. I am starting a new project and i am still figuring out how to remove the photos from the previous project. There should be no photos selected from previously if i am starting a new project. The layouts are also limited. The old apple product was so much better and it’s a pain to use mimeo

Review.Titre: The Calendar building process too fussy…
Review.Contenu: The Calendar building process is very antiquated and cludgey. Particularly for assigning small photos to dates. Should be drag and drop. Requires way too many clicks. Should be able to organize photos by month. Should be able to save custom dates from year to year. Birthdays, anniversaries, etc. It’s like I‘ve never created a project before each time.

Review.Titre: Disappointing
Review.Contenu: Payment expected in Euros instead of dollars, no possibility to select type of shipment, very expensive shipment costs, as high as the calendar… I ordered my calendar because I had spent time to prepare it, but this is the last time I use it from the Apple Photos app in view of these high costs…disappointed because I have been using it for years…

Review.Titre: I won't be ordering as many calendars…
Review.Contenu: I won't be ordering as many calendars this year because of the inability to copy an existing calendar. It takes me hours to add all the notes and photos to a new calendar. If I want to duplicate this calendar I have to repeat the many hours to create another one. You need a copy calendar including copying a previous year calendar for a new calendar year. I commented on this last year and nothing was done about it. Now I just will not be ordering as many calendars.

Review.Titre: You need to have a customer service…
Review.Contenu: You need to have a customer service phone number to call and talk to live person.  This email and chat does not work well.  Your site can be very confusing for customers who may be ordering from Canada. Would have been much easier to talk to live person and explain my questions.  Response time was very slow in chat.  Wasn’t impressed

Review.Titre: Product is great, but purchasing process a nightmare
Review.Contenu: The product is great, but the experience was horrible.  It took five submissions, a call to customer service, four credits to my credit card and for someone to get into they system and override why my project was not fully downloading.  It took me as long to buy the calendar as it did to make it--unacceptable.

Review.Titre: Took Too Long
Review.Contenu: I submitted my calendar on December 14th. On the 15th I got an email saying the shipment was ON ITS WAY. Then frustratingly I got another email almost a week later on the 21st saying the shipment was on its way again and that the delivery date had changed. I really thought that by submitting the order on the 14th I'd have the calendar by Christmas. I'm disappointed as it's a Christmas gift for my parents that I give every year. I've never had this problem with ordering from Mimeo and may re-think doing so next year.

Review.Titre: Jpeg Format Required
Review.Contenu: I've made projects with you before, and all went smoothly.  This time I couldn't finish the process so I went to support and got someone who was helpful in getting me signed in, but that wasn't the problem.  He finally said that it was a problem with the images.  I asked then whether the images had to be jpegs and was told yes.  I was trying desperately to finish and buy the calendars to take advantage of the 25% off the order, but by the time I converted the images, the offer had ended.  All went smoothly after that.

Review.Titre: Thanks for asking
Review.Contenu: Thanks for asking.  First off, the shipping price was extremely high to send just a few prints.  Secondly, the quality of the prints was not good.  I had a family portrait where the heads of the people were cut off at the hairline which made the photos useless.  The prints were delivered in a reasonable time but I found that going to Walmart proved to be a much better experience.

Review.Titre: The Discount Code Would Not Work
Review.Contenu: The system was glitchy.  After I would input a photo to a calendar date, some of the time (but not always), it would not let me then edit the photo.  Also, I ordered two calendars separately.  One order llowed me to use the "Lastcall" discount code but the other one would not recognize it so I could not obtain the discount when I checked out.  I had spent literally hours building the calendar or I would have just cancelled the whole order.  I won't be using Mimeo again, although I have used it for several years now for building calendars.

Review.Titre: Ink marks throughout pages
Review.Contenu: I have been using Mimeo for years. However in my latest photo book of 100 pages, there were ink marks in over 50 pages of the book. Totally unacceptable for a print professional

Review.Titre: VERY SLOW DELIVERY
Review.Contenu: My order was confirmed as having been RECEIVED by you on Aug. 16th.  I was charged $13.99 for shipping.  MY ORDER WAS NOT DELIVERED UNTIL 8/29.  As a result of this VERY SLOW DELIVERY, I was UNABLE TO SEND THESE CARDS TO THE RECIPIENTS IN TIME FOR THEIR BIRTHDAYS!!  I had allowed PLENTY OF TIME for the manufacture and shipping of these cards and the SLOW DELIVERY got it ALL MESSED UP.  I had to pay almost $30 for EXPRESS DELIVERY to get one of the cards to one of the great grandmothers on time for her birthday.

Review.Titre: The program froze multiple times while…
Review.Contenu: The program froze multiple times while creating the book (like every few minutes as I tried to add more photos)… I kept worrying I would lose everything but it made the whole process extremely slow and worrying. I’ve used this program lots before but am not sure I would again after this experience.

Review.Titre: I had a 20% off code, BUT
Review.Contenu: I had a 20% off code, but it wouldn't take it, so I overpaid $6.99,  Now a day later I get an email for 25% off.  Not good marketing.I have ordered from you for 3+ years and I like the quality and ease of making my projects, but I feel screwed over, so I will have to reconsider for future projects.

Review.Titre: Mistakes Were Made More than half of the 8 1/2”  x  11”…
Review.Contenu: More than half of the 8 1/2”  x  11” pages were printed at a smaller size.  When I called to ask how I could correct those & reprint the 40 page book, I was told (by two different folks) that it was impossible.  Paralyzed in my place.  Help, please!  Judy

Review.Titre: Frustrated with the difficulty in completing this project.
Review.Contenu: This is not the first project I have made with your company, but I could not get the extension to work. We had to chat with a representative and go online, which indicated a lot of others have had issues like this.  It took me a great length of time to finish this project.  I was pleased with the final project, though.  Also, completed a survey and received a discount code, but it would not work when I tried to use it on this project.

Review.Titre: Price seems a bit high for what you get
Review.Contenu: The quality of the framed print is nice, but the frame itself feels like it’s on the cheap side. The online interface was frustratingly limited as well as the options for frame sizes etc, and the prices seem high for what you get. Customer service was helpful which I appreciated but I will probably just use a local place next time.

Review.Titre: Good quality calendar, poor quality shipping and packaging
Review.Contenu: The quality of the calendar we ordered was great, the unfortunate part was how the calendars were shipped. Not only did the prices go up several dollars per calendar, the packaging for the shipping was low quality. All the corners of our calendars were damaged and bent when we received them. These are gifts for our families, so it's pretty disappointing that you're raising your prices and yet skimping on packaging where the items get damaged. I'll be using another service next time. Don't raise your prices if you're going to skimp on delivering what could have been a much better quality experience and item.

Review.Titre: This App Could Be Great, But Needs Improvement
Review.Contenu: The experience of creating the album was tricky because the photos imported into the app according to image ID #, rather than timestamp or the order I had put them in.  Because I was putting together three different cameras' worth of photos, it was a nightmare trying to choose the shots from a given moment--I had to constantly scroll to see the rest of the photos from that moment, which were in three different places.  Also, the default margin between photos is too small, but the next default size up is too big!  It would be nice if the space between photos were more easy to adjust.Finally, when I got everything placed where I wanted it, I was excited for the final product.  Two of my albums arrived banged up in one corner and all three had grainy images--shouldn't the print quality be better for $150???

Review.Titre: International shipping (unable to combine projects)
Review.Contenu: I like that I can create a project straight from the photos app on my mac.I really dislike that you cannot combine shipping. Shipping to NZ is EXPENSIVE. I ordered four photo calendars as Christmas gifts for grandparents. They were created as two projects of two calendars each (as different photos were used for each project). I was unable to ship the projects together and ended up paying over NZ$50 to post the four calendars. I would have placed the order elsewhere except I had already spent so much time creating the calendars and did not have time to repeat the process.The quality is GREAT but I would not order again unless I could combine shipping or shipping was reduced. Thanks

Review.Titre: Despite multiple requests from multiple…
Review.Contenu: Despite multiple requests from multiple users, you still have not implemented the ability to include pictures in the vacant day blocks of a calendar month (i.e., adding a picture into the dates of the previous or next month that appear on a given calendar month).  This was a feature of the original Apple-based calendar.  Please re-code your app to allow this to happen.

Review.Titre: Tiny sized photographs sent on large…
Review.Contenu: Tiny sized photographs sent on large pieces of paper. Absolutely terrible. No mention of this resizing before they were sent. Very disappointed and want my money back.I will upgrade this to two stars because the refund was issued without delay, thank you.

Review.Titre: Poor instructions…
Review.Contenu: It’s not at all obvious how one makes Christmas cards on Mimeo, even though I have done it for five years running. Details of the process change every year, so I started out by emailing Mimeo to get some guidance on how to proceed. I got a response saying someone would get back to me soon, but no one ever did, so I ended up trying to figure it by myself. I ran into  problems and was unable to submit my order despite the fact that I tried three different credit cards, plus Apple Pay. I contacted Mimeo again for help but didn’t get a timely response. All of this could’ve been avoided if there had been a clearer set of instructions on how to proceed.

Review.Titre: Unimpressed
Review.Contenu: Mimeo indicates that you can choose from a variety of different styles of calendar (that is all we typically create) but they are essentially all the same. The shipping is ridiculously expensive and if you order two different products going to the same destination, even within minutes apart, you pay for shipping twice.  Not only is this frustrating for the consumer, it is inefficient for Mimeo.  The reason there are two stars is the result of the product is fine.  However, I have three different reminders to choose a different company next year.

Review.Titre: I’m still waiting….
Review.Contenu: While I enjoyed using the app to create my photo book, it is taking too long to reach me. I was supposed to receive it on 17Jan. But I see on the tracker that it’s been stuck in Melbourne awaiting departure for the last 2 days!

Review.Titre: Too expensive
Review.Contenu: Too expensive compared with other solution available on the market.I won’t use miles photos anymore.That’s a pity because it easy to use with app Photo on macOS.

Review.Titre: Nothing so far but wanted your…
Review.Contenu: Nothing so far but wanted your attention. have purchased 3 copies of a photo book and I had questions during the building of it. You do not have a contact number for help and whatever was online doesn't help or answer the question.

Review.Titre: The photos weren’t printed out…
Review.Contenu: The photos weren’t printed out properly, but the issue was resolved very quickly with a refund. I don’t think I’ll use the service again, unfortunately.

Review.Titre: Clarity missing on the book
Review.Contenu: I ordered a calendar which I was very happy with. The book, however, seemed to lack the crisp clarity from the print process that was evident in the calendar. This review is delayed because I just returned to visit the area where both the calendar and book were delivered to. I never had that problem when Apple printed my books. And all my photos were reviewed for clarity on my iMac prior to sending them to you for the book.

Review.Titre: Printed colours often are different…
Review.Contenu: Printed colours often are different from what we get on our computer screen. Calibration problem? Many printed pics are too dark. Considering the price, this should be avoided.

Review.Titre: There is no way to shrink a photo to…
Review.Contenu: There is no way to shrink a photo to fit a picture frame.  The customer service person worked with me, but told there is no way to do it.  There are so many things about this program that make doing normal things difficult.

Review.Titre: Way too expensive for the tiny cheap…
Review.Contenu: Way too expensive for the tiny cheap looking book we received. Plus we payed as much in shipping cost than for the book itself. We only found out after spending hours making the book. So we dumbly paid 30€ pour a tiny photo book. That’s a total rip-off.

Review.Titre: I ordered five photo books
Review.Contenu: I ordered five photo books. One had pages missing. Another was sent out right away to replace it and I did receive apologies from staff.  I order books every spring and calendars every fall, plus some puzzles. I have found the quality to be very good until this last order. The book folders have started to rip and are not as sturdy as usual. A “we are sorry” coupon for a future order would be appreciated.

Review.Titre: The flow is not fluid
Review.Contenu: The flow is not fluid. Having to download the photos from another platform makes it slow to built the calendars or books. Sorry but it was a lot easier when Apple included the option within it’s photo app. a

Review.Titre: So time consuming trying to upload…
Review.Contenu: So time consuming trying to upload photos. Could not upload album, had to do it one at a time. Have some duplicates in my photo book but it’s way too confusing to move photos around which could have resulted in less pages. This book is over $130.00. I can’t afford that so I didn’t order it. My first book was only $56.00.

Review.Titre: Your user interface is slow & not very…
Review.Contenu: Your user interface is slow & not very intuitive.  There are 2 structural things that would make it a lot easier to use:1) Although you can copy a project, you cannot batch delete photos so you either have to delete them one by one, which is painstakingly slow or navigate a much larger photo selection.2) You cannot copy a page layout, so if you want multiple custom pages, you have to either copy the layout one picture space at a time (let's say 12 in a double page spread w/ 6 pictures per page) or build from scratch.Both seem like easy improvements to make, but I've contacted customer service every time I've made a book (once a year for the past several years) & no upgrades have been made.

Review.Titre: Mistreated albums
Review.Contenu: I order one album every year for my anniversary. I´ve loved it every year, its such a good memory for my boyfriend and I. I live in México but I always order it to the US, since I have a place there aswell. This is the first year I order it to México and both albums arrived mistreated, I probably won't order to México again. I just wanted to tell you so that you can take care of the packaging and avoid this from happening to other customers.

Review.Titre: I was very disappointed that I couldn’t…
Review.Contenu: I was very disappointed that I couldn’t add multiple calendars to my cart. I made 4 different ones and had to pay 4 separate shipping costs. I will not be using Mimeo in the future unless they change this feature.

Review.Titre: Great book but poor and expensive shipment
Review.Contenu: Great book, but I payed more than 12 euro for shipment, that went completely wrong. My book ended up in Capri, Italy. I received a message that I had to get in touch with UPS myself. In the meanwhile, I got my book, but for such an amount of shipping costs, I would expect Mimeo to deal with this problem and not me as the client.

Review.Titre: I completed a photo book for my daughter’s 18th birthday
Review.Contenu: I completed a photo book for my daughters 18th birthday and it cost approximately $250. I received it the other day and was disappointed with the quality of the photos and the thickness of the pages. For the past 7 years I have been using Mimeo to generate a year in review photo book and the quality has been excellent, except for the latest book. Abit disappointed as they are not cheap.

Review.Titre: The app crashed on me so many times
Review.Contenu: The app crashed on me so many times. I had so much time invested in uploading my pictures, so I didn’t want to quit. If I knew it was going to crash and take so much time I would have used a different app.

Review.Titre: Pictures are way too dark
Review.Contenu: Pictures are way too dark, losing beautiful detail. I used the programs auto-lighting option to ensure the pictures were light enough because they were to dark on my 2022 calendar you did for me last year.

Review.Titre: The estimated delivery time / shipping…
Review.Contenu: The estimated delivery time / shipping time is totally inaccurate and not up to date. The book quality is acceptable. Would prefer the book wrapped in a plastic cover/bag during shipping especially the humid rainy weather might damage the parcel box.

Review.Titre: My calendar photos printed out much
Review.Contenu: My calendar photos printed out much, much darker than the actual photos themselves. I can forward screen shots if it will help, but these printouts are not reflective of the source material at all.

Review.Titre: the final result was good
Review.Contenu: the final result was good, but the user interface could use improvement in making the editing easier.  I had to start over at least three times because I couldn't figure out how to undo mistakes and there is no help function or instructions that I could find.

Review.Titre: Text print was different on EACH page!!
Review.Contenu: The text on each page was printed smaller and smaller until by the end of the book it was unreadable = very disappointing

Review.Titre: I think that the books are quite…expensive
Review.Contenu: I think that the books are quite expensive compare to the competitors.The shipping fees are way too high and you find out only at the end when your project is ready to be shipped.I had pictures deleting as I ordered my project only a while after making it.Mimeo could not get my pictures from the cloud so I had to download them all over again even though I has first downloaded them when first creating my album

Review.Titre: Expensive, limited layouts
Review.Contenu: Was always expensive but now more expensive.  Layout features are still limited - have to manually make borderless layouts for each page - particularly when dividing into thirds.

Review.Titre: Wish the process had been simpler
Review.Contenu: I found the creation of project very difficult to navigate -After creating the one project I took to completion i desired many more but in frustration switched to another photo site.

Review.Titre: Watch the year of the calendar you are creating. Be sure you adjust the default date that Mimeo presents on the first few steps………..
Review.Contenu: When creating calendar in late Dec 22/early Jan 23, the default year that comes up on the beginning of the process is 2022. But it’s the end of 2022, about to be 2023 in a matter of days. This makes no sense at all.

Review.Titre: Damaged in shipment
Review.Contenu: 1st attempt at printing a photobook was damaged in shipment and printed way too dark. I called and the book was reprinted to our satisfaction.

Review.Titre: I had to use an App Cleaner before the…
Review.Contenu: I had to use an App Cleaner before the app would work.  Once it got working, I had difficulty ordering as it kept saying that it couldn’t save my billing address.  the Tech Support were saying, don’t check this or don’t put a space in the postal code, etc..  Honestly, the app should work with spaces, dashes in phone numbers and regardless if you check a box or not (or remove the box completely).  I have ordered 7 calendars through Apple when it was with them, or Mimeo when they got out of it.  Next year - the FIRST TIME IT FAILS, I will go with a different app.And with all the technical problems, I spent almost an entire afternoon on tech support, I ended up making a mistake on the calendar.  Why?  Because I was too fussed about making it work and not taking the time to check what I was doing - and now I can’t change it.

Review.Titre: Plugin on Mac OS runs extremely slow…
Review.Contenu: Plugin on Mac OS runs extremely slow with of connection issues. We ordered 3 different calendars but had to pay 3x an expensive expedition fee. It is impossible to group

Review.Titre: Had trouble adding photos to my…
Review.Contenu: Had trouble adding photos to my project. Also had a problem setting up my card project…kept getting a phot album template. I found this project not user friendly.

Review.Titre: Your app is not very user friendly in…
Review.Contenu: Your app is not very user friendly in my opinion. I have used it several times mostly to make calendars and still find it frustrating. E.g., Why is it so difficult to add extra photos to your project by dragging them into it? It often takes more than one attempt. Why are half the pages called “Collage” instead of, say, “April Photo Page,” etc.? Why all the choices of calendar templates when many of them are little if any different from the others? It takes me far more time than it should to produce a calendar!

Review.Titre: meh...
Review.Contenu: I ordered prints and did not receive all of the prints that I had ordered.    I ordered several prints of various sizes and did not yet get the 2 prints that were a nonstandard size (5x10).    Otherwise the prints I received were fine.

Review.Titre: I wanted to reorder an album and…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to reorder an album and several pictures had vanished. I’m not going to make anymore photo books with you since the photos often disappear years later.

Review.Titre: I created a 220 pages book and the…
Review.Contenu: I created a 220 pages book and the first and last page (with photo) is not perfect sticked. Usually, everything are perfect with Mimeo, but this time, not the case.I wood love also to have a template "Photo Book" where we didn't have any margin to the end of the page. A border between the photo is perfect, but the margin to the page, I changed all the time all photo...and take a lot of time.

Review.Titre: You can’t reorder a product.
Review.Contenu: I spent a lot of time creating a Calendar for my parents that they loved and wanted replicated. This option is not available.

Review.Titre: Please fix the iOS app
Review.Contenu: Please fix the iOS app. It crashes every time I ordered my project and tried to pay with Apple Pay. It takes the money from my credit card but my project never gets shipped. This happened to me two times, the app would crash as soon as you submit payment. I had to order on the website instead.Support team is fantastic, very fast replies. Was able to get my money refunded both times.

Review.Titre: The delivery has been way too late with…
Review.Contenu: The delivery has been way too late with little communication.

Review.Titre: Not easy to use
Review.Contenu: Not easy to use. Help instructions too hard to find. Very expensive. I preferred the Apple app which was much easier. Not likely to use it next yesr.

Review.Titre: Weak midtones, lack of balance
Review.Contenu: Photo midtones were weak, while the tints were too pale, and the darks were too dark. Seems there needs to be better white balancing and black balancing in the prints.

Review.Titre: I'm a little disappointed that one day…
Review.Contenu: I'm a little disappointed that one day after ordering, a 15% discount on calendar ordering appears in my inbox. So I ended up paying full price.

Review.Titre: Time consuming process to produce calendar.        For the past 5 years if not more we’ve…
Review.Contenu: For the past 5 years if not more we’ve been asking Mimeo to enhance the calendar process by enabling us to save events for the following year.  Said differently, allow us to duplicate the calendar project, change the start date of the dupe project and remove all photos.  That would actually save time in terms of data entering dates year after year.  Apple photos used to let us do that.  I create and purchase 10-12 calendars every year and it literally takes me 2-3 weeks part time to complete all data entry and photo choice and layout.  I wasn’t going to do it this year, but the recipients really like the calendar.  This may be my last time and I am going to warn others that this while the product is lovely, it is takes a lot of time to produce that I’ll never get back.  I would add that it’s disappointing to see that Mimeo has asked for and seen feedback similar to mine for years, but refuses to do anything in terms of rectifying the situation.

Review.Titre: The image didn’t look as sharp as it…
Review.Contenu: The image didn’t look as sharp as it did on my photo and perhaps a glossy print would have been better.

Review.Titre: I can no longer do a calandar as I…
Review.Contenu: I can no longer do a calandar as I don’t have your lasted update as my computer is too old. Also I wanted 2024 and I got a2023 calandar.

Review.Titre: Your products are fantastic but too…
Review.Contenu: Your products are fantastic but too expensive … Although I believe I’m a faithful customer, I’m never given any promotion code nor any kind of discount year after year.

Review.Titre: Quality in book is NOT related to quality data in App
Review.Contenu: The Apple Photo App and the technical part worked well. However, again and again the app defines certain photos with a bad quality (which I tried to minimize). When the photobook was delivered I experienced that all photos marked with bad quality look perfectly fine, and most of the others are in a bad quality. Summarized: I paid 330.- for 3 copies. For this price I can expect a better quality and since this happened not for the first time, I will use another provider in the future.

Review.Titre: Shipping fee a Rip Off
Review.Contenu: Although calendar price is fair the cost of shipping[[ing is outrageous! Shame on you. It's a bait-and switch scheme. Will not use again

Review.Titre: Delivery service is really poor
Review.Contenu: Delivery service is really poor. It took more than 2 weeks transit time, and in the end I had to pick it up at the ups depot….

Review.Titre: Still haven't received package..
Review.Contenu: Still haven't received package... went track shipping just says it's arriving the next day. Been like that for 5 straight days.

Review.Titre: Shopping cart made it impossible to…
Review.Contenu: Shopping cart made it impossible to input the 10% promo code so I finally gave up.  I don't like it when companies rob me.  Cost me $26

Review.Titre: Problem Fix Promise Broken Every Year
Review.Contenu: I am disappointed that year after year after year I spend hundreds too much on shipping. I place all my orders at the same time. They are coming to the same address. But they are needlessly, wastefully, and inefficiently (resource-wise) shipped separately. It is sooo customer UNfriendly.

Review.Titre: My issue is still not resolved… I was…
Review.Contenu: My issue is still not resolved… I was to hear back from someone… and no one has responded to me yet

Review.Titre: Low quality
Review.Contenu: Low quality paper and development. Doubt I will use this company again.

Review.Titre: It could be better
Review.Contenu: Supportline with quick, friendly response but without solutions after a huge delay of production und delivery…

Review.Titre: The quality of the card didn’t match my…
Review.Contenu: The quality of the card didn’t match my expectations. The folio came off when I received it.

Review.Titre: Damaged product
Review.Contenu: I think the quality of the product/pictures is very good. I was however very disappointed that the corner of my calendar was folded when I took it out of its packaging. More care should be given by your team when placing the final product in the Mimeo packaging. Considering having received a damaged product (not due to shipping) I find your product pricey. Not sure I will order again.

Review.Titre: Try to match colors and values to the submitted file
Review.Contenu: Try to match colors and values to the submitted file.  The postcard looks duller and less saturated in the colors.  The postcard is a little bit darker in value.  Pleased with the turnaround time for the final cards and envelopes.

Review.Titre: The app is great and easy to use, but the single order is a drawback
Review.Contenu: The app is great and easy to use to create the calendars.However, the fact that we cannot order more than 1 calendar creation (I create 4 different calendar christmas gifts/ year) per order is a serious drawback that is making reconsider my use of Mimeo.

Review.Titre: Not consumer friendly!
Review.Contenu: Mimeo makes it difficult to tie your book projects to their so called promotions. I tried numerous times to design 5 travel books for my daughter and could not make their codes work. In the end, they got what they wanted, my 5 books at $250.00 full price, and from now on it's Shutterfly for my projects!!!

Review.Titre: I have use mimeo photos to make…calendars
Review.Contenu: I have use mimeo photos to make calendars for many years.  This year was a bit disappointing as many of the photos came out darker than desired.

Review.Titre: We have ordered many calendars from you…
Review.Contenu: We have ordered many calendars from you over the years. There quality is great, but the app is not very. User friendly and should be improved.  I don’t think it has ever been worked on since its creation.

Review.Titre: I use Mimeo and Photos to make Family Calendars
Review.Contenu: I use Mimeo and Photos to make calendars for family every Christmas. The final product, as delivered is fantastic, but... Mimeo works just ok. I find it clunky to work with while editing calendars, for example there does not appear to be the ability to make global page layout change. Program is also buggy, requiring Photos to be quit and reopened.The ordering process is also clunky. For example, it requires me to re-enter my CC info for every order.Finally, the pricing has gotten too high; came to over $40 per calendar this year including shipping. At that price, this will probably be my last year making family calendars... or at least I will be MUCH more selective as to who gets them.

Review.Titre: Ok but not great.
Review.Contenu: I ordered a couple of photobooks as school gifts. Delayed a few days to be delivered which wasn't great. And the huge Mimeo logo on the protection cover wasn't great either. We won't use this company again.

Review.Titre: Hidden costs are too much!
Review.Contenu: The experience of adding photos has always been clunky even when Apple managed the calendar creations. What I can't believe is the crazy price of shipping this year, I have been creating calendars every Christmas for the past 15 years and never seen it so costly. It was advertised as 27 euro but then added on another 12 for shipping and a further 9 for tax! Far too expensive, only the fact I spent a long time creating the calendar did I proceed with purchase, next year I will look elsewhere!

Review.Titre: End Product Very Good - Getting there is cumbersome
Review.Contenu: I find the end product - in the case a calendar - to be very good. I find the interface to create a calendar cumbersome.

Review.Titre: The quality of the printing is not very…
Review.Contenu: The quality of the printing is not very good, too dark and colorful compared to other years. Delivery took for ever.

Review.Titre: Good service, print quality could improve
Review.Contenu: Good service, but really wish the print quality was better. Its the best app around for doing it from photos but its a an expensive thing to do and i am dissapointed with the print quality!

Review.Titre: Great product, mediocre software
Review.Contenu: Quality of product was excellent. The software was really cumbersome when I needed to change layout, explore different picture options, or simply organize the many pics that I have. Also DHL as a shipping service is always a little nerve-wracking as it ships from US to Canada. Really wished they used USPS + Canada Post.

Review.Titre: There is a misalignment in the…
Review.Contenu: There is a misalignment in the printing.I would like to see an improvement in the unusually high shipping costs.

Review.Titre: Damages photo pages.
Review.Contenu: Love your products which I've been purchasing for 13 years.   However this last order 3 calendars had pages with white streaks across the images.  for this i only gave a 3 stars.

Review.Titre: Great printing service, customer care not as much
Review.Contenu: Photobooks in the usual quality and fast. Box and three out of ten books were tainted with ink, some still wet when arriving. Photographs were not enough to just get replacement of these three, which was the cheapest order I ever did (~$15 each).

Review.Titre: The end product is great
Review.Contenu: The end product is great. Photos well produced on heavy paper. Getting that result was a bit challenging.     I had to second-guess how to download the photographs. I couldn't just drag them from my desktop. I ended up making an "album" of the photos that I wanted. I was able to get those pics into the program.
