It took me a while to figure out how to adjust the size of the lettering beneath each photograph. I wanted a white margin at the bottom of each picture for the title. I never could get that, so I made do with the title in the photograph at the bottom.

Review.Titre: Its hard to edit within your program
Review.Contenu: Its hard to edit within your program, especially to re size/zoom or move slightly right or left.  When you do outside of program the picture file then doesn’t fit with your parameters.Also the identification that youve used a picture already, isn’t quite strong enough, I used 2 twice

Review.Titre: Well
Review.Contenu: Well - You have agood product - but the app is clunky and You need skills to make something nice.

Review.Titre: Too expensive
Review.Contenu: I like your calendar product but unfortunately it is getting far too expensive to keep ordering.

Review.Titre: Product is ok, delivery not
Review.Contenu: Product is ok, but expensive. Delivery via UPS is lousy. Got a notification, stayeyat home, and they dropped it at a collection point. They didn’t even pass by. I ordered 2 albums and couldn’t combine the delivery and thus paid the delivery fee twice.

Review.Titre: Discount code always gets rejected
Review.Contenu: I was disappointed for the second time when the check out process kept rejecting the 25% discount code I received via email. It’s happened before and I can never seem to get through to customer service to rectify the issue. Clearly there is a bug in the software but mimeo doesn’t want to hear about it.

Review.Titre: Challenging but wiorth it
Review.Contenu: Although creating the calendar was a real chore and couldn't have been completed without assistance the finished product was a joy.

Review.Titre: Ordering the printed project was BEYOND difficult.
Review.Contenu: Ordering the printed project was extremely difficult.  I did the project using Motif, which is one of the options listed by Apple Photos.  I was unable to order it directly.  Fortunately the help people at Mimeo were, after MANY exchanges of emails, able to figure out a way to order by using a circuitous set of steps.  The finished product looks very nice, but, I will certainly not use the Motif options ever again.  I actually prefer it to Mimeo because it seems more simple.

Review.Titre: Just ordered several calendars for…
Review.Contenu: Just ordered several calendars for 2024. Price keeps rising, but quality is not keeping up.

Review.Titre: Mixed experience
Review.Contenu: App was relatively easy to use and photo book arrived quickly. However I was entirely satisfied with the product.  On the spread where there was one photo across two pages, a large portion of the photo couldn’t be seen as it was inside the spine.  For this reason I would be unlikely to use Mimeo again.

Review.Titre: I am generally happy with you and the…
Review.Contenu: I am generally happy with you and the quality of your products. I do find it difficult to navigate at times as with my last order. I wanted to order one holiday card per each photo. I had to order 10 cards per photo, or pay more for shipping... than the cost of one card.I do think your shipping costs are too high on anything I've ordered. It would be nice also if you offered more discounted offers. Shutterfly does better than you in that area.

Review.Titre: The quality is great
Review.Contenu: The quality is great, but one star off because it was not clear in Apple Photos that part of the image would be wrapped to back of the frame (gallery wrapped canvas), subsequently cropping off parts of the imager to the side, that I hoped would be sufficiently on the front panel. I had done a lot of Photoshop work to extend the image to fit according to what's indicated in Apple Photos. It would be nice to have that extra guidance. I took another star off because the largest canvas size I can seem to get from you in Canada is 11x14", much smaller than desired.

Review.Titre: Overall good; some easy improvements would be welcome
Review.Contenu: I appreciate the quality, but Mimeo needs to work on their app to allow more flexibility in working with, adding to, or changing preferences, and baseline information.The shipping packaging is not as good as it was even a year ago.

Review.Titre: By and large good
Review.Contenu: By and large good, but editing gets a bit long as it keeps going back to the beginning. If there are page/month thumbnails it will be easier - and faster - to complete the project. Otherwise all good.

Review.Titre: Ridiculous shipping cost
Review.Contenu: The quality of the prints I ordered was fine.  The exorbitant shipping fee will keep me from ordering in the future.  I could accept the high price of my order if the cost of preparing the prints was higher, but the shipping was (much) lower.  I hate spending $14 shipping on a little envelope!

Review.Titre: Not too impressed
Review.Contenu: Not too impressed, photos look dull. The photos I uploaded were shot on a Sony A1, high megapixel and edited in photoshop to look great. And they do other places I printed them, such as an MPIX calendar I made. This book is a disappointment.

Review.Titre: Good quality of the final book but annoying design process
Review.Contenu: Good quality of the final book and quick delivery, but the design process was REALLY annoying. I wanted to create a book out of two prior books I created and the apple mimeo app just wouldn’t let me cooy readily designed pages I had alteady done from one work to another. Also the app crashed several times. Really restrictive and annoying, so I‘m looking for another apo/service ti design my next works. Really a pity because I liked the quality of the print snd binding.

Review.Titre: Easy Assembly, Frustrating Pricing
Review.Contenu: Putting the book together was easy and intuitive. Pricing is frustrating. After investing hours of work to make a book at a pre disclosed price, you are hit with the added cost of unreasonably high postage. These are books and can go at a low book rate. If you search the internet and the stars are alined, you might find a discount code to offset part of the postage... maybe not. It would be much better to offer your quality product at a total price that seems fair and not engage in a form of subterfuge.

Review.Titre: I did not find your app to be very…
Review.Contenu: I did not find your app to be very simple to use know where the placement as photos as good as it has been in the past. I also had difficulty creating and moving text messages. The final product looks good but not great. Some of the photos that span two pages get cut off in the middle because of the binding. I will probably be looking for a different application in future. .

Review.Titre: Generally good but the text on the…
Review.Contenu: Generally good but the text on the cover was a bit blurred. All the text inside the book was clear. Never had this problem on any of our other amimei books

Review.Titre: Mimeo is GOOD but could be GREAT
Review.Contenu: Mimeo is GOOD but could be GREATMy wish list includes:- Making customized dates easier, including importing dates from prior year calendars (e.g., birthdays)- allowing for mini photos on dates that are greyed out (e.g., prior or next month)- interface that is less clunky between page changes- click and drag photos from underlying sources

Review.Titre: The ease of it connected to my photos…
Review.Contenu: The ease of it connected to my photos on my MacBook is excellent. The ability to make it look nice and professional is also very good. It is not very user friendly and the ability to customize things is difficult and there are not enough options. There should be more fun pages that you can add and other photo books have things like stickers that you can put on pages which would be nice. Also, the ability to "zoom out" in some of the photo layouts would be helpful as occasionally it cuts off some of the picture.

Review.Titre: Mimeo valentine card 2023 review
Review.Contenu: Two things would have helped me more easily create the photo card I wanted to make: 1) I would like to be able to change the theme of the card without going all the way back and starting over (and if there is indeed a way to do that, some obvious instructions would be good), and 2) the colors of the background and the colors of text should be coordinated so they can be easily matched within the card.

Review.Titre: I had trouble seeing the texts that I…
Review.Contenu: I had trouble seeing the texts that I added and positioning them. I also wanted more flexibility for size and location of pictures on pages. The circle that had my initials ( for login or something) was in the way of using options easily. But I am happy with the quality of the book.

Review.Titre: The shipping and VAT costs make products too dear.
Review.Contenu: The quality is top class.  I have loved the calendars, hardback books and canvases I’ve ordered in the past with Motif.  However, I’ve just completed a 2024 calendar which should cost Euro 24.99 but with VAT and shipping added it comes to Euro 45 for one calendar.  Way too expensive for customers in Ireland.  I suspect Brexit may have caused these price hikes!  I can’t see the value for money with Mimeo and regret I can’t afford it anymore.

Review.Titre: It is an excellent service and very…
Review.Contenu: It is an excellent service and very easy to use. I have used Mimeo since Apple discontinued their own photo book service. However, this year I got an error message twice while trying to build the books and had to restart the project (two times) which was very frustrating. I contacted support but there was nothing they could figure out.

Review.Titre: Product Great, Postage Not.
Review.Contenu: The product itself is great.The delivery postage costs are expensive and inconvenient.Moonpig will charge c.£2 for delivery. You charge c.£10 and then if the package needs collecting from the local depot and you refuse to hand over the package if you have not taken identification.Moonpig is also faster.

Review.Titre: Expensive shipping to Croatia.
Review.Contenu: Shipping to Croatia costs 2 times more than to any other EU country  e.g. Italy (our first neighbour). There is no real reason for this because Croatia is in EU Schengen region and in EU Sepa region as Italy.Calendar design, user experience on WEB and final print quality I like. Overall too expensive, I was ordering calendar last 6 years, but now Im starting to look for alternatives.

Review.Titre: Mimeo Survey 2023
Review.Contenu: The problem that I have was that I used the photo's app to build my Calendar and then used Mimeo to process into the calendar. This process changed all the font sizes( 9 & 10) I did in photos into a very small fonts  (size 6)hard to read on the calendar from a distance. I liked the ease it was to pay for the Calendar. Sincerely Jim Curtis

Review.Titre: Photos were cut off due to selected size
Review.Contenu: When I ordered my photos there was no way to see that some of them would be cut off in the size I ordered. It would be nice if it gave a cropped preview or flagged if photos would be cut off. Also, the colors didn't print as vibrant as they appear on my phone.

Review.Titre: Good quality, slow shipment
Review.Contenu: Good quality, but excessive time in the shipment process. it took 2 days to produce and 11 days to arrive, which is not acceptable since the package was sent within europe.

Review.Titre: The photo pages themselves were very…
Review.Contenu: The photo pages themselves were very nice and the software is pretty good. The book itself is tiny for what you pay for. I’m sure this is outlined at the time of purchase but most people would order the standard book which in the past, has been much bigger.

Review.Titre: The price rise is unacceptable
Review.Contenu: The quality is excellent but the price rise this year is just stupid!This will be my last mimeo calendar after many years.

Review.Titre: Overall a great product with a few, small challenges
Review.Contenu: I had a few challenges with the Mimeo app in Photos that prevented a higher score. Initially, it wouldn't show me any layout options for pages, and I had to restart to get them to appear. I used the arrow keys to nudge an element, and then it kept moving in that direction even when I unselected and re-selected it — I had to restart again.I took off a second star because the DHL shipping process was unpleasant. The book arrived in my Canadian city on Friday, September 1st, but wasn't delivered to me until almost a week later. They blamed the long weekend for the delay, but the long weekend is in the calendar well in advance and is their challenge to manage as a company. I would recommend a different provider for international shipping.

Review.Titre: Too expensive for the paper quality
Review.Contenu: Too expensive for the paper quality. I think, it was better qualitative in the past.  Last projects were less qualitative with incrising price.  I think I will make a market review to find another supplier.  It time to test. By the way, you are the only provider who use UPS and They are really bad.

Review.Titre: Ok for fist time but will not repeat
Review.Contenu: Liked the integration with apple pics and the ability to sort by used/unused photos Likes the templates tho I felt there could be more options Did not like having to order separately and pay for shipping twice Did not like that the shipping difference was almost double and the timing difference was only one day (and I couldn’t see that before making the shipping type decision)Did not like the price. The only reason I ordered was because it was too much work to remake the books with a different tool. But based on the “value for money” it’s not worth it cause other places provide larger format for less money)

Review.Titre: Some helpful suggestions
Review.Contenu: I wish your selections of photo books had more of a description (visual) as to what the pictures/pages would look like. Also, is there was a way to change your project from say soft cover to hardcover midway thru a project? Lastly, the largest you can see of the page you are working on is still a bit too small on the computer screen.

Review.Titre: Your photobooks need more layouts
Review.Contenu: Your photobooks need 2x or 3x as many Layouts. Apple photobooks had many, many more options. Using custom layouts isn’t feasible because you don’t have a ruler so it’s impossible to make symmetrical and same-sized layouts. Especially you need to add 8 vertical pages, 6 vertical pages, mixes of 7.  You prioritize square photos but iPhone default is 4x3 aspect ratios.  Your layouts mostly leave border, but you can print to the edges, so give that option more. This all seems so easy to add!!  Check the old layouts Apple used to offer on iPhoto. Your print quality is good otherwise.  Also it could be easier to drag/switch a placed photo without deleting and re-adding. But way more layout options is MAJOR way you could improve.  Thanks!

Review.Titre: I’ve used mimeo for years
Review.Contenu: I’ve used mimeo for years, the quality seems to be less good as in the past.  Specifically the photos in my album are considerably darker than i believe they should be compared to previous projects I’ve done with mimeo.

Review.Titre: A very good app … which could be improved
Review.Contenu: I consider photos to be the best software to create photo books. There are still a few things that could be improved. I described that in another post. A lot went wrong with my last project. But the support was helpful und Mimeo replaced a book having minor issues on the dust half-title. In the end the quality of the book was excellent as usual.

Review.Titre: Somehow my calendar project saved the…
Review.Contenu: Somehow my calendar project saved the cover, events listed for the calendar and the photos added for the project. However the pictures I added for the layout were not saved and I had to start the layout portion over completely which was very frustrating. I chatted with a representative whose suggestion was to reopen Time Machine which I wasn’t able to do. I thought I had saved the calendar multiple times before closing it, but apparently it didn’t help. After I redid the whole calendar, I had no problem submitting it and placing my order a couple days ago.

Review.Titre: I was unable to order a project via…
Review.Contenu: I was unable to order a project via Photos. Your tech support was helpful but, ultimately, could not solve the problem. I uploaded the project to your website and ordered it from there. That worked. But the fundamental issue - Mimeo not working within Photos - remains unsolved.

Review.Titre: Nice templates but laborious insertion of birthdays
Review.Contenu: Nice calendar templates, easy upload of photos and good support of official holidays but inserting events / birthdays is really laborious. Why not take over birthdays from previous project or at least allow tabular insertion instead of going to the calendar every time again?

Review.Titre: Dislike
Review.Contenu: Dislike: The gray sheets, first and last pages of the book are glued to my photo pages. Thus my photos are only partially visible due to the low quality book binding. This is the second consecutive book to incur this issue. So, fix the binding process. Actions speak louder than words

Review.Titre: cost is extremely high (in AUD$)
Review.Contenu: cost is extremely high (in AUD$). i bought multiple book (expensive) books and i think there should be a discount or loyalty program for good customers. I would like to be able to work on photo books off line - i would do a lot more. filters could be improved (more inline with insta). should be able to move single pages (not only spreads). should be able to flip design on a single page (your competitors can do this).

Review.Titre: My photo book arrived in a UPS parcel…
Review.Contenu: My photo book arrived in a UPS parcel bag without it’s protective sleeve and no plastic wrapping on the outside. The photo book had gotten wet and the pages warped on the bottom. In a separate UPS bag was the protective sleeve and it was saturated. I had to throw that away. The book is still useable but I’m disappointed that the pages got wet and are now wavy on the bottom. None of my other books from Mimeo arrived in such a state.

Review.Titre: I really like the calendar app
Review.Contenu: I really like the calendar app, use it every year to design family calendars, I still do not understand nor enjoy having to re-enter all of the same event dates......grr and adjust the font of each individuallyOtherwise, a terrific product is produced :) Thank you

Review.Titre: Too many difficulties
Review.Contenu: Too many difficulties - apparently related to the Ventura operating system on Macs.  Had very good response from your tech support, but nobody could figure it out and I finally found fixes on my own. Then was unable to buy the book - it apparently never uploaded.  So I was finally instructed to save it as a PDF and then was able to order.  Just a lot of hassle - and it used to be easy!

Review.Titre: I ordered a photo book and I don’t…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a photo book and I don’t think it got reviewed before shipping as 6 of the pages had white smudge marks over my photos. However, once I notified the company they immediately processed a new one and checked it and shipped it for free.

Review.Titre: The photos great, book not so great
Review.Contenu: The photos turned out great, however the binding broke/ ripped, the pages and the white cover were dented and in both books some pages were stuck together creating tears when separated.  I really hope you can take more time in the future making sure the book is put together and handled right.

Review.Titre: Software ok but some features missing.
Review.Contenu: Software straightforward.   I miss the ability to enhance / lighten / darken/ half tone/ mono the photos once they are placed on a page.   This feature is handy when using text over a photo on covers, dividers etc., and does exist in Mixbooks for example.

Review.Titre: I had a hard time at first knowing what…
Review.Contenu: I had a hard time at first knowing what to do to get photos to be used for the calendar. Instructions a bit confusing for old people who are not very adapt at using a computer.It was so disappointing when my calendar came with the words "Untitled Project" across the cover. I assumed it would be blank if you didn't add a title.Delivered very quickly. Photos were clear and colourful.

Review.Titre: So sad
Review.Contenu: I have used Mimeo several times over the past 7 years.  The most recent order was inferior in both paper weight and photo reproduction.  I was very disappointed.  The company was kind enough to redo book, and while better, still not up to the quality of past editions.

Review.Titre: Easy to use and support if needed
Review.Contenu: Easy to use and support if needed. Final quality isn’t great, photo reproduction isn’t nearly as good as when Apple was doing the books themselves.

Review.Titre: I have made many photo books before
Review.Contenu: I have made many photo books before. I watched your videos in YouTube. I found your layout to be very confusing and frustrating.  I had to contact help twice.  I would prefer to TALK to a person not type. Default print color should be black!Written or verbal instructions are needed.  I do not read symbols very well. For example I never would have figured out on my own that you needed to change ink color or how to do it.

Review.Titre: The product is great
Review.Contenu: The product is great, the program to make the book is easy to use, which I appreciate.  The ordering was super silly to use - ordering different numbers of books  to 3 different addresses.  I needed help and even now after so many tries don't know why some attempts worked or didn't work.  The discount I had to ask them to apply.  It was very frustrating in the end.

Review.Titre: The process itself is very…
Review.Contenu: The process itself is very straightforward but the pictures were not optimized for the size requested. Most looked zoomed in and not quite the right ratio

Review.Titre: Do not have photo printed on wood.
Review.Contenu: The order process was very easy to follow and the turn around was very good. However, I was not very pleased with my photo printed on wood. It greatly reduces the resolution of the photo. Adding the white background would have made the photo stand out better but this defeats the purpose of printing on a wood texture. I probably should have expected this.

Review.Titre: great final product but a few frustrations
Review.Contenu: I found the text boxes too small - hard to get much commentary in. Many of the layouts did not accommodate the portrait size of pictures taken on the a cell phone which is pretty common these days. The books look great when done - good quality and excellent resolution in the pictures

Review.Titre: I have been making Mimeo photo books…
Review.Contenu: I have been making Mimeo photo books for several years and enjoy the photo reproduction quality, the layout options and until now, the options with text boxes of font choice, size etc. However for a recent soft covered book I made for my grandson, I was really disappointed to find in the book that some of the print is barely visible even though I definitely adjusted it when the warning sign came up on checking on the PDF. I do find the font hard to read in the text box but I think there a couple of lines on about 6 pages on this occasion which I think are faulty. I have since received another hard cover book from a recent trip to Italy which is fine. I would appreciate hearing from you about my soft cover 8x8 book as it has cost over $60 Aus as was i intended to be a gift. Im not sure I can gift it as it is.Kind regards, Norma Edwards

Review.Titre: Convenient I enjoy the convenience of using Mimeo…
Review.Contenu: I enjoy the convenience of using Mimeo with my Apple Mac It’s very easy to edit and create photo books. The books I received this time I didn’t think the photos were as clear as previous books, and I am using the same camera

Review.Titre: Great looking calendars - with two major pain points
Review.Contenu: The calendars look great and Mimeo continues to be the best way to make calendars on a Mac.  But adding events, which I do a lot, is tedious.  I create similar calendars every year with the same events, but there is no way to copy events from one year to another.  I have to re-type in every event every year.  iPhoto used to let you import .ics calendar files.  I would love to see that feature in Mimeo Photos.  Similarly, iPhoto used to let you drag and drop photos onto calendar dates, like you can for the main monthly photos.  The process for adding background photos to specific dates in Mimeo is cumbersome.

Review.Titre: I had a lot difficulty using your…ordering system
Review.Contenu: I had a lot difficulty using your website to finish my order. I had to contact customer support numerous times to be able to even place my order. The customer support was good but it took quite a while to solve the problem I was having. I am extremely happy with the calendars I received but, to be honest, I almost gave up and went to Shutterfly. In the end, I'm glad I didn't.

Review.Titre: Good quality unnecessarily expensive
Review.Contenu: While it was easy to obtain a print of one of my photos, I got the exact same thing and quality through Google Photos for less than half the price

Review.Titre: UI can be greatly improved
Review.Contenu: UI can be greatly improved.  For example, it would be nice to move the calendar pages around and/or move photos to a different month without having to do it all manually.

Review.Titre: Great quality but a few strange pages
Review.Contenu: The last few pages did not save and came through with an off centre border, while the rest were full page. There was some error coming up but it did not make sense. When I go back into the project, all of those pages that printed oddly are gone. Great print quality and colours.

Review.Titre: I have made photo calendars with your…
Review.Contenu: I have made photo calendars with your company for several years - for some reason it was difficult to navigate this year. I was also trying to reach someone for help, sent Email, got no response - I don’t think it even went through.

Review.Titre: Purchase process is poor
Review.Contenu: Product and project creation are great! The ordering process is a rip off. I cannot order more than one project at a time so the shipping fees cannot be combined. It's exorbitant. I'm returning to Shutterfly.

Review.Titre: The app kept on crashing when mimeo app…
Review.Contenu: The app kept on crashing when mimeo app is in the background for a while.Not being able to load a calendar of events is quite annoying. Having to re-enter key birthdays and events each year is getting boring. If you can’t come up with that feature, perhaps you can create some kind of calendar project template I can maintain and use for future years. App has a relatively weak iOS photos integration - it’s impossible to work with dynamic albums and searches. All photos have to be uploaded first. This app work more like a website than a true app. I used it for a calendar with lots of photos and my needs aren’t catered for very well by the app.I only use the app because print quality is consistently good every year.

Review.Titre: Disappointed
Review.Contenu: I asked for prints taken by professional photographers and was quite disappointed that most of the prints were underexposed and that some photos had parts of the subject cropped out.The order was quite slow in processing and at times, I wondered if it had gone astray!

Review.Titre: There was an error in my photo book (…
Review.Contenu: There was an error in my photo book ( the book jacket had the wrong photo) and I went to the website to try to find a way to correct it. But I couldn’t. I would have liked a phone number to speak to someone who might be able to order me a corrected book jacket.

Review.Titre: I was redoing a project and the program…
Review.Contenu: I was redoing a project and the program rejected photos that I had used before.  ThankfullyI was able to source them from another file and USB stick.I did find the previous Apple i'photo Journal program which I used for many years much easier.

Review.Titre: I like the general ease of using the…
Review.Contenu: I like the general ease of using the site. I disliked having to pay for shipping for each order — I’d like to combine orders given your shipping price. Also I couldn’t figure out how to omit the logo on the back of the folded card.

Review.Titre: Hard to start a new project after…
Review.Contenu: Hard to start a new project after completing one. I gave up.  Hard to move off the mimeo landing page.  When an image is taken out of the project (eg calendar) and altered the file jumps back to the beginning of the project.

Review.Titre: We had trouble submitting the the book…
Review.Contenu: We had trouble submitting the the book for print via the app in my MacBook Pro Photos app. It would not complete & we had to Call for help & get several refunds of charges to my CC. We had to submit as a PDF to get it done. Also, we couldn't fill the page with multiple pics without them overlapping.Finished product turned out Great!

Review.Titre: I couldn’t add pages to my book so I…
Review.Contenu: I couldn’t add pages to my book so I ended up having to make 3 books. If there was a way you should make it easy to find. That really sucks and costs so much more.Just got your reply. Good to know Thankyou It would be really nice if you put next to that + a couple words like “ More Pages “

Review.Titre: Too much hassle for a mediocre result …
Review.Contenu: Your customer service is eventually responsive but it takes time and patience to get there.More importantly your product is only marginally acceptable.Won’t be back nor will I recommend you.

Review.Titre: I liked the different layout options…
Review.Contenu: I liked the different layout options and, above all, the fact that I could keep the original size of my photos.I was disappointed by the color rendition, which I found too dull.

Review.Titre: It was ok
Review.Contenu: It was ok. Surprised with how long it took photos to ship; I was never provided a shipping confirmation, and customer service was slow to update me on the status of the order. Photos look good, but I will probably use a service that has a faster turnaround in the future.

Review.Titre: Easy to use, but limited flexibility.
Review.Contenu: Yes, the program is relatively easy to use.  The lack of additional page configurations (especially in the 4+ pictures per page) is an on-going frustration.  The page configurations have not changed for years.The number of photobook configurations seems a waste.....the real need is more flexibility at the page level.  Positive:  processing/delivery is fast.  The ability to sort by used and unused photos is a very good feature.Negative:  sometimes the printing is less than great and the lack of flexibility at the page level (much less than apple photos used to have) is a real drawback.

Review.Titre: I was a bit disappointed as the photos…
Review.Contenu: I was a bit disappointed as the photos seem to be really dark. I have done books previously and the books were fantastic and I was expecting the same. It could also just be my bad photography skills!

Review.Titre: I received a message that Mimeo…
Review.Contenu: I received a message that Mimeo recently changed ownership. I didn’t mind that, until I saw the quality of the photobook - the images are darker and the paper used is lighter and more glossy. Big difference from previous prints… very disappointing.

Review.Titre: I have trouble saving photos at times
Review.Contenu: I have trouble saving photos at times. The book came with 2 corners of the paper book flap crimped and missing colour. There was also a crimp in the book flap at the back on the top. I appreciated the real time chat that was available. I wanted to use some photo spots for journaling but the “put your photo here” words were still visible causing confusion at check out. The chat person was able to confirm that it was ok to order that way and it came out fine.

Review.Titre: Delivery costs too high
Review.Contenu: Delivery costs too highNot possible to put more than 1 album into the cart... all shipped separately

Review.Titre: I love the quality and relatively ease…
Review.Contenu: I love the quality and relatively ease of use.  All, cards, memory books, calendars are as beautiful as I expect when making the projects.My only negative feedback is connected to the cards orders I typically place around Christmas time.  It has been now two years in a row that the order comes in without the envelopes.Which then totally defeats the "extra cost" for "fast shipping" since I then need to contact Mimeo, place the claim and wait another week to get the envelopes.  Needless to say frustrating.

Review.Titre: Excellent printing and binding
Review.Contenu: Excellent printing and binding of both photo books and calendars.  Delivery is impressively prompt.  The only problem I have encountered:  on books, it is not possible to choose either a font or a size for the writing on the SPINE of the book;  I need to be able to customize the spine (like the cover and the page captions), but cannot do so.  Otherwise no complaints at all.

Review.Titre: It would be helpful to support saving…
Review.Contenu: It would be helpful to support saving ‘dates’ from year to year. I’ve been doing family calendars with apple/mimeo for years. Adding each person’s birthday, anniversary is a challenge that should be relatively easily solved by software. Our families look forward each year to receiving their family calendar.

Review.Titre: Creating the photo books was easy and…
Review.Contenu: Creating the photo books was easy and ordering along with delivery was quick. Out of 3 books created and ordered 2 were delivered early with no issues. The third book had a delay at the US boarder, delayed about a week and was slightly damaged. This was relating to the delivery process not the printing process.

Review.Titre: User-friendly, excellent quality but excessive cost of delivery
Review.Contenu: The app is user-friendly. The final product is really very nice. What I would like though is the possibility to order different calendars and pay for only one delivery. We ordered 3 calendars and had to pay 3 times $22 for delivery. I contacted the client service to find a solution but there was nothing they could do. Then, we received the 3 boxes same day, same time, same courier. What a waste! We’ve been clients for years, but now that we have more calendars to order and because of the prohibitive cost of delivery, we’re looking at other companies where we could pay less for the same kind of product.

Review.Titre: Good Experience!
Review.Contenu: Easy to use, great quality of materials and very efficient delivery.I missed more flexibility in the calendar pages with texts and images. For instance, only English/Spanish were available.Also, as a suggestion, it would be good to allow calendar import with all family birthdays and events, so we do not have to load all the info every year.

Review.Titre: Experience using my Apple IMac was very…
Review.Contenu: Experience using my Apple IMac was very good. Generally very happy. What I didn’t like was not being able to access my projects from the online app. No ability to see delivery times of finished projects on order.

Review.Titre: What would make the experience really…
Review.Contenu: What would make the experience really great would be the capability to combine orders into one order and have only one shipping charge. One big advantage tome as a customer is that I could order multiple cards with different photos so one could make mixed card packs as gifts, etc. I know other companies do allow one to combine orders. Thanks.

Review.Titre: Useful features
Review.Contenu: It would be nice to see how the different calendar options really vary, and to be able to switch from one to another without starting over.ALSO--is there a way to copy pictures for one month and put in a different month when you realize you accidentally skipped a page?

Review.Titre: The Process of Making the Calendar Was Straightforward.
Review.Contenu: The process of making the calendars was pretty straight forward and it was easy to add my photos. I gave 4 stars because the photos in the calendar appeared a bit darker in the printed calendar. Also there were two photos where there were some odd dark shadows on the people in the photos. These shadows were not in the original photos. I've used this company several times and have accepted that this is as good as it will probably get.

Review.Titre: The programme was easy to use
Review.Contenu: The programme was easy to use, and the quality of the paper and thus the photos is firm.  Edges don't curl even in hot humid weather.  I am finding the cost of shipping is becoming very high, especially as I have to pay in Canadian Dollars.

Review.Titre: Good quality
Review.Contenu: On the whole I’m pretty satisfied with Mimeo, but I do wish you would provide more templates.  I know how to create my own page designs, but it’s very fiddly and time-consuming.  What I would particularly like are two templates Apple used to offer, firstly, one large photo across most of the page with four small ones at the top or bottom; secondly, a 13 picture page, one larger central photo surrounded by twelve little ones.

Review.Titre: A beautiful presentation for Christmas gifts.
Review.Contenu: Making my calendar with Mimeo is a creative and easy way to use my bird photography to gift my friends and family for Christmas.  Only less than perfect things this year was there was no economy class postage and the cover photo was too dark.  The rest of the pictures within the months were beautiful Thank you.

Review.Titre: The product is absolutely amazing…
Review.Contenu: The product is absolutely amazing quality. You guys need to allow the customer the ability to order and package individual ‘different’ calendars together. I did six different personalized calendars that  cost over 156 US $ for shipping.  That is ridiculous!  My calendars are all produced in about 2 days. Why can’t I put them in a shopping cart and then do one order?  What a waste of resources and having six different trucks delivering the calendars.  In terms of environmental damage and resource gluttony your company is not doing anything to solve  these problems. How about reading this and changing your process as I have suggested this for two years and I do not see you taking this suggestion into your process?  Amazing product, but I will make a decision about using this company on how this shipping issue is dealt with.

Review.Titre: I recently gave Mimeo Photos a poor…
Review.Contenu: I recently gave Mimeo Photos a poor review based solely on the delivery system, however Mimeo, which has always been very good at their job, has contacted me and, I believe are looking into their delivery system. I trust them and appreciate their commitment to making sure customers are happy. Thank you Mimeo for taking my review seriously. Mimeo is very good to deal with if things go wrong which is reassuring.

Review.Titre: Very quick delivery and great quality
Review.Contenu: Very quick delivery and great quality. A smudge mark seen when book closed on top of all the pages. Wish the 30 something % discount came round more often. Have only ever seen it at Halloween so need to wait till next year for another order!

Review.Titre: Really good quality calendars
Review.Contenu: Really good quality calendars. Software is (mostly) easy to use. Quick shipping. What made the review a 4 instead of a 5 is not having a “copy format” feature in the calendar so you have to relayout every month. Very time consuming and seems like such an easy fix.

Review.Titre: Good quality, very expensiv
Review.Contenu: It is a good photobook, but very expensive. We ordred only one copy but wished to ordred more to the rest of the family and to our self.

Review.Titre: I had ordered 5 calendars as Christmas…
Review.Contenu: I had ordered 5 calendars as Christmas gifts. Only 1 calendar arrived. I emailed and Rachel took care of the problem by reprocessing the calendars and send them quickly to me. Dealing with everyone was easy and very efficient. Thank you look forward to working with your team again. Beverley Hunchak

Review.Titre: Sometimes
Review.Contenu: Sometimes, the formatting is a little restrictive. In general, photos are easliy placed where you want them.

Review.Titre: Mimeo Photo Book
Review.Contenu: Mimeo Photo Book has exceptional quality.  I did place a second order and the book had some production defects.  After a chat with Mimeo, I uploaded photos of pages with the defect along with screen shots of the same pages on my computer.  Without having to return the Photo Book, Mimeo mailed me a error free and corrected Photo Book at no charge.

Review.Titre: I have now had twelve photo books made…
Review.Contenu: I have now had twelve photo books made by you and all have been excellent. Color has always been accurate and photos are very clear. My one criticism is the first few pages don’t fully open and sometimes the photos or text closest to the binding are covered slightly even though I keep the positioning within your guidelines.

Review.Titre: Good bits, less good bits
Review.Contenu: Overall the quality of the production is very good. The time between order and receipt of final product is very good. Not so good is the total attention to dispatch detail as part of the production run arrived without coverage folder.

Review.Titre: Christmas Gifts
Review.Contenu: I ordered 2 photo calendars and 1 photo book for Christmas gifts.  The quality is good, but the pricing is rather high.

Review.Titre: The page set up is easy but I wish I…
Review.Contenu: The page set up is easy but I wish I could import the date parts of the calendar to use from year to year and just change the pictures.

Review.Titre: Great turnaround time
Review.Contenu: Great turnaround time; great reproductions; had trouble with text box, though, and one stayed across a photo in the final product -- suggest making them easier to see against backdrops.

Review.Titre: Love the quality!
Review.Contenu: Each year I create nine calendars for Christmas gifts. I started doing this through Apple, but then transitioned to Mimeo when Apple got out of the calendar business. I was fearful the quality would not be as good, but was pleasantly surprised when the first Mimeo calendar arrived. Last year several of the calendars arrived with the spiral metal “page attacher” installed backwards and the pages came apart. I was not happy after spending so much money. I decided to give Mimeo another try and this year they all came out beautifully. I am very pleased with the quality, but a little shocked at the current price of over $47.00 per calendar (the shipping price is steep and I wish there was some way to bundle the calendars being shipped to my house to cut down on the cost.)

Review.Titre: Good qual calendars easy to create.
Review.Contenu: The calendars are easy to create and give a good final product.  The one thing I miss is the possibility of placing the letters about an event, birthday,etc not on the photo as usually you can’t see the letters.  Other than that I am pleased with the experience.

Review.Titre: Pricey but good quality
Review.Contenu: The print quality is excellent but in the past four years the price of a calendar has increased 48% and the cost of S&H to Canada for 3 calendars has increased 91%.

Review.Titre: Damaged in packing
Review.Contenu: Creating the calendar was fun. Calendar turned out very nicely. Unfortunately who ever packed the calendars forced them into the cardboard container and consequently damaged the corners on two of the calendars. This was obviously done in the packing not after they were shipped.

Review.Titre: Great app, produces great calendars -- need better shipping options
Review.Contenu: The app is really great, once you get the hang of it (which didn't take too long).  It has lots of great templates to help set up calendar pages, etc. easily and effectively. I've used it for several years, and the calendars always come out really well -- nice high quality paper and binding.My only complaint is that I'd like to package my entire order into one shipping charge.  We do customized calendars for different family members, and each calendar comes separately, with separate shipping charges, which makes them VERY expensive per unit.   (The shipping is almost as much as the actual calendar.) I'd like a way to put the different calendars in a "shopping basket" so I can checkout once and have all delivered at once for one delivery fee.

Review.Titre: Good program, help available, poor delivery.
Review.Contenu: The assistance when I had a just expired voucher was great. I wish there were more page layout options, especially for 5+ photos when making a large book. My only problem was with the delivery - the instructions are to leave by front door (which is undercover). Instead it was left just inside gate - had it rained or our watering system turned on before we found it, the book would have been damaged. This has happened before with the book being left out in potentially wet weather.

Review.Titre: Nice product
Review.Contenu: Everything about the finished calendars was beautiful. I love the product and it was a very fast turn around. I received my calendars within the week of uploading the photos. My only complaint is the price of shipping. It is higher than any other product that I’ve ordered.

Review.Titre: Good app, nice calendars
Review.Contenu: Calendars are nice, but some of the pictures come out darker than what they look like on the computer.  App is fairly easy to work with.  One issue I have is I make multiple different calendars and I haven’t found a way to order them all at once to avoid paying shipping charges on each one.  Price, especially with shipping charges, is somewhat high.  I do like the large size of the calendars, the multiple layout choices, and the ability to identify events with photos.

Review.Titre: Great Calendars
Review.Contenu: Calendar is high quality and is easy to prepare. I would like to be able to load multiple photos at once rather than just one photo at a time. If it is possible to load multiple photos, I would like to see directions how this can be done.

Review.Titre: I’m satisfied with final result,however…
Review.Contenu: I’m satisfied with final result,however total cost is too high compared with other products,and regular customers like me would appreciate more discount along the year .

Review.Titre: Deserved five stars but for one thing!
Review.Contenu: Deserved five stars as Printing and quality great of a photographic calendar  BUT Delivery stressful - as did the same as last year - for some reason changed postcode and sent to wrong depot (I live in Channel Islands) so they don’t recognise postcode…Excellent Customer Service / resent with correct address ..and is here now and very happy with resultFive stars to Customer ServiceOne star to Packer!

Review.Titre: Heavy pages
Review.Contenu: The book looks very nice.  However, I’m disappointed that the pages are so thick. I have made photo books with Mimeo for many years and the pages are now much thicker and the cost has almost doubled.

Review.Titre: the finished product was…
Review.Contenu: the finished product was wonderful,thank you

Review.Titre: Service was very good
Review.Contenu: Service was very good. Helpline and delivery was quick and efficient.  Would prefer more choices of paper, more choices of patterned backgrounds, ability to fade and modify tones of page backgrounds, provision of background clips such as colored swooshes underneath text.  Would be nice to have more features enabling more customer creativity

Review.Titre: Shipping per book is aweful
Review.Contenu: Could be better if I could bundle multiple books to pay once for shipping.

Review.Titre: Almost like the Apple program
Review.Contenu: Almost like the Apple program, good but less creative and a little less intuitive, but since the Apple system doesn’t exist any more it will suffice. Quick turn around from sending to receiving.Will continue to use Mimeo

Review.Titre: I used the website to design my photo book.
Review.Contenu: I used the website to design my photo book because I am not an Apple user. My suggestion is to have an Android app as well as Apple. The website was very user friendly, easy to navigate and figure out quickly. I did reach out to customer service while designing the book and customer service was efficient and helpful with every question. Customer service actually told me that I could design my photo book on the website to start with.

Review.Titre: The cards came looking exactly as I hoped
Review.Contenu: All was great, but I could not find a link to order more when I ran out.

Review.Titre: Always my go to for photo books!
Review.Contenu: Always my go to for photo books! Not sure what happened to my old account and I used to get discount codes sent, but great product.

Review.Titre: I use for the quality of the product
Review.Contenu: I use for the quality of the product. In my case a calendar. They match my colour well and print quality is superb. BUT it is ever so expensive and has increased in price too steeply over the last three years I have used to produce my annual calendar. There seems to be no justification for such increases. I will certainly be comparing others for my 2025 calendar.

Review.Titre: Reliably good quality
Review.Contenu: This is my third book. And I've done several calendars. The overall quality seems quite good to me. This book was unlike my others because it featured photos of paintings. The colors in the book were not exactly as they appeared on the screen.  Not sure if there's anything that can be done about it. For some reason the color differences don't seem as noticeable with most photos that are not of paintings.

Review.Titre: Good overall but still needs some improvement.
Review.Contenu: Overall the experience was very good. The program was relatively easy and quick to use. As I’ve told you in previous reviews, I still think that it needs more variety of page layouts. After cropping some photos simply don’t show well with your current layout choices.

Review.Titre: For many years I used Apple to make…
Review.Contenu: For many years I used Apple to make calendars and cookbooks which Mimeo then published.  Altough Mimeo has made improvements, they are still not as user friendly as Apple was.  The first year, I could not alter the letter size on the calendars so made half my family calendars with Motif so my father-in-law could read the birthdays printed on the calendars.  I printed a family cookbook with Mimeo and did not realize Mimeo did not number each page automatically like Apple did and needed to number each page one-by-one.

Review.Titre: Great prints
Review.Contenu: The quality of the photos and the speed of the service was exceptional. My only concern would be the cost of the shipping which was $13.99 for three prints which was standard. Seems a bit much.

Review.Titre: Mimeo holiday card success!
Review.Contenu: I designed a holiday card using a Mimeo software template.  The software is just a little finicky, and when I’d goof up it was difficult to recover from, but ultimately I am happy with the final product.  I like that I can write a fair amount that can be printed in any font and color on the back of the card.

Review.Titre: Product good but problem with resolution
Review.Contenu: Product good but don’t like the way Mimeo insists that perfectly good photos taken with my Canon Camera have resolution that is too low. This has rarely happened in the past & now happens most of the time.

Review.Titre: Over all a great product!
Review.Contenu: Workflow and interface is good. However I still miss being able to include page numbers automatically. I had problems placing the order, but got good follow up and help from the help desk to solve the issue. Over all a great product!

Review.Titre: Good printing of cards and calendars
Review.Contenu: Good printing of cards and calendars. Colours not quite so accurate as in previous years but paper quality and sharpness of printing very good. Past years I would always have given five stars.

Review.Titre: Why I like Mimeo photo albums
Review.Contenu: Allows for a book of annotated images that are very personal and meaningful with little technical know-how.Best use of some of the tools would be enhanced by a manual or by a YouTube description of best use.  The existing YouTube videos are more promotional than helpful for an app that, by its nature, gets used only every few months or years.

Review.Titre: New User
Review.Contenu: I need more experience with the text choices in terms of size.  All the photo placements were easy and expected.  I did eliminate some photos because I thought the resolution would be poor.

Review.Titre: Had an issue when books I ordered was…
Review.Contenu: Had an issue when books I ordered was stuck in transit due to missing documentation from sender. And I was told I had to sort it out, which I couldn’t since I was the receiver. It resulted in a delayed delivery and I was relieved to have ordered early so had the time. Never had this issue before, though. It has always been smooth sailing.

Review.Titre: The actual production was great
Review.Contenu: The actual production was great. But shipping with Puralator and Canada post not the best. Package didn’t move for days and tracking appeared not to work on my computer until delivery day. So I probably made a nuisance of myself requesting updates ☹️

Review.Titre: Good results but shipping too expensive
Review.Contenu: Photobook result was good. The production process was fiddly but ok after some experience. The shipping cost was shockingly double their competitors which added a lot to the total cost. I'll try someone else next time.

Review.Titre: very good
Review.Contenu: Had the wrong address and the help e-mail worked to get it changed.

Review.Titre: What happened to the clear envelope…
Review.Contenu: What happened to the clear envelope around the book and jacket? Can we at least buy the envelopes?

Review.Titre: Generally good quality
Review.Contenu: The book was printed as ordered and generally looks very good. There’s room for improvement: (1) more accurate printing/wrapping of cover so white space (which belongs on the inside flap) doesn’t appear on the front and (2) software should be sensitive enough to warn me when inserting photos that an enlarged photo will be slightly pixelated.

Review.Titre: Beautiful photo book, creation process challenging
Review.Contenu: Mimeo allows me to create a beautiful keepsake photo book from a trip, which was the project I completed on Oct. 16.  The app can be challenging to use, however.  I often need to scroll through ALL the photos I have placed in the file to use for the book, rather than the software taking me to the last photo used.  The app sometimes quits unexpectedly; I panic -- although my work was never lost.  Sometimes it is difficult to see if the SAVE function has worked properly.  Text boxes can be difficult to place on a page, and text editing is clumsy.  Overall, though, I am very happy to be able to create my own photo book online.

Review.Titre: Excellent calendars…
Review.Contenu: As usual the calendars were excellent in quality and were delivered quickly.However the continual yearly price rises together with a shipping charge of $60 for 12 calendars this year, has me considering an alternative source of my Books and Calendars.A pity after decades of very satisfying association.

Review.Titre: Worth the Price
Review.Contenu: Pricey product and expensive shipping but worth it, as calendar is beautifully composed and printed

Review.Titre: Great Memories
Review.Contenu: The calendars are wonderful as always…extremely well done!! It took a bit longer to receive them this year, but we love them, & they make perfect Xmas gifts for my Mom & Aunt (in their 90’s), as they bring back fond memories 😃

Review.Titre: Mimeo is easy and fun!
Review.Contenu: Creating photo album with Mimeo is easy and fun! The quality of the final product is good and it can be a nice present for special occasion.I learnt this on my own.. some features may be enhanced such as the picture adaptability to the chosen picture frame).

Review.Titre: Fun to work with Mimeo
Review.Contenu: I really enjoy making my books this way and maybe because I've done it quite a few times, now it feels easy and convenient anytime I design and print one of these. My only comment is that the difference between book design themes seems to be almost non existent now. I was able to clearly tell the differences between styes before, now they all seem the same style, with different names. So I make my own.

Review.Titre: A very professional product.
Review.Contenu: It was a joy to put the photo book together. Very straightforward with plenty of options. The book itself was sent very quickly and the final result was very professional. The only slight disappointment was that my snow photos all had a blue tinge.

Review.Titre: Prints darker than expected
Review.Contenu: As a graphic designer, I know there is a difference between screen and printed images. However, I thought I had adjusted the images enough to compensate for this. Since there is no way of getting a proof sheet, I will have to print a couple of my most challenging images and use them as a guide to adjust the batch.It would be nice if Mimeo gave guidelines for iPhoto settings to help the client better calibrate their images to Mimeo printers.

Review.Titre: Overall it’s a good experience.
Review.Contenu: Overall it’s a good experience.Only be very careful when you select the size of your album. I made in the past 10 times an album and believed my system would present me at the start of the creation the same as previously selected.. it wasn’t!Another remark, it would be greatly appreciate if we could edit our pictures while doing the album, within the Mimeo application.

Review.Titre: Fine pictures only 2 pictures was the…
Review.Contenu: Fine pictures only 2 pictures was the same🤔

Review.Titre: The final product was great but I would…
Review.Contenu: The final product was great but I would like to be able to put 10 or 12 photos on a page using mimeograph photos.  I’ve done that by creating single jpg for each page with 12 pics on each. That was a lot of work. But I couldn’t find that option in the app. Other than that it was great.

Review.Titre: Brilliantly quick turnaround!!
Review.Contenu: Brilliantly quick turnaround!!Only fly in the ointment, is that the reds printed a little hot. All in all, another good experience!

Review.Titre: Recording memories
Review.Contenu: The program is fairly easy to use even if you are not entirely computer literate. I started making photo books on my Apple computer until they discontinued their program. I tried several new programs before I settled on Mimeo. It’s a very quick efficient service too.

Review.Titre: Extraordinarily high delivery cost
Review.Contenu: I would have given Mimeo 5 stars if it hadn't been for the unwelcome surprise of the extraordinarily high delivery cost which was only revealed once I'd made the book. I'll try another service next time.

Review.Titre: Quick and easy
Review.Contenu: The whole process was so easy to work through  even for a novice.Easy to follow, to comply and easy to complete the photo book.

Review.Titre: The platform is pretty easy to use.
Review.Contenu: The platform is pretty easy to use.  I've made at least a dozen books with Mimeo.  Shipping is very quick - especially around the holiday season! My only wish is that I didn't have to put page numbers in manually:)

Review.Titre: I don’t speak English…..
design of…
Review.Contenu: Really love the printing and design of the album and materials used however my glossy cover was creased on the edges of the spine which was a shame when presenting it.Usually it is perfect - but both copies had the creased/cracked spine on the outer cover.Disappointing really.They are very good value and the software is superb.

Review.Titre: The large calendars are excellent, but the ordering sure isn't!
Review.Contenu: The large calendars are excellent, delivering photos as fine as I was used to when Apple produced them. Unfortunately, that is ruined by the very inconvenient ordering process that requires me to reproduce my order three times simply to send the same calendar to three addresses.

Review.Titre: Product quality is always very good
Review.Contenu: Product quality is always very good. The checkout part of the site is a bit awkward. I was hung up on some field but it wasn’t very apparent what the issue was. I did finally find the field that causing the purchase not to go through.

Review.Titre: The final print books were beautiful
Review.Contenu: The final print books were beautiful. I do wish there were a few more layout options that make slightly more efficient use of the spaces on the pages, but we do love the image quality!

Review.Titre: Happy to be able to work with Apple Photos, but needs some updates to save time...
Review.Contenu: I really appreciate being able to design my photobook within Apple's Photos app. The ?plug-in / app definitely could use some updates to make it quicker and easier to use however.  The interface is very sluggish to load and moving things around is a bit clumsy. It would also be great is we could use our own self-defined guides for laying out and have the option to "snap to" those guides as an on/off feature.Ultimately, I had zoom in and out to try to get things to line up and even many times had to close the project and reopen it to have some control to shift items.  Another suggestion is allow us to turn on/off the tool bar and page views (at bottom) when we go into Full Screen view to be able to expand the page(s) we're working on to expand more.

Review.Titre: Easy work, great product
Review.Contenu: Making a calendar with Mimeo was easy and the result was exactly what I'd hoped it would be.

Review.Titre: Nice end product.
Review.Contenu: Very happy with the book.But … Creating the book took a bit more effort than I expected. For example:  It’s cumbersome to modify pages - you can’t seem to separate them into individual pages and move them around.  Changing the page layout is also hard.  You can’t use a photo as a page background (or I couldn’t figure that part out.)

Review.Titre: The album looks very luxurious!
Review.Contenu: The album was made with great care, the photo's are beautiful printed. It looks very luxurious.It is a pity that the address ticket was not printed correctly, the apartment number was not on it and the delivery ws delayed.

Review.Titre: Good quality books
Review.Contenu: Good quality books. Pages smooth and thick, binding quite nice. Limitations with the software, more flexibility making the book would be helpful, like the automated photo placement didn't seem to work well. Photos printed a bit dark overall.

Review.Titre: Limited Design Options But Photo Color Quality is Great
Review.Contenu: Photo quality on the calendar I ordered was better than the same calendar made with Mixbook. Design options are very limited, especially for photo books.

Review.Titre: Love the simplicity of this program
Review.Contenu: Love the simplicity of this program. The printed quality is great. What’s not great is the shipping costs and that you can’t have more than one item in your cart and ship them together. That seems simple enough to do and could save the  user a lot of money.

Review.Titre: Happy to repeat the exercise
Review.Contenu: We are first-time users of the Photo Book software and found it relatively easy to get around with plenty of editing functionality. Shipment of our albums to Jersey in the Channel Islands appeared to cause a problem as the order was returned to sender before being re-shipped. The quality of reproduction is good.We only found out after having paid for our order that first timers would receive a discount - this was not promoted at the time, which would have been nice!

Review.Titre: Would love to see expansion of layout of pages
Review.Contenu: I like the quality, however I would like to see more variety of the layout of the photos.In the past each Theme of the various books had lots of interesting layouts of photos that made albums unique and different. Now they all look the same and really limited. I don't understand the point of choosing different Themes when the layouts remain the same.

Review.Titre: Very quick delivery and happy with the…
Review.Contenu: Very quick delivery and happy with the quality.Putting together was sometimes messy. Would be helpful if photos uploaded were able to be resorted into date order, and once used marked as such someway.

Review.Titre: Good quality product
Review.Contenu: Good quality product with fast turnaround. Would like to see more options for multiple photos on a page other than just squares. Would also like to be able to move a single rather than just a double page.

Review.Titre: Good quality
Review.Contenu: Quality of prints are good, delivery is fast. Interface could be better, adding text isn't always easy. Real problem: not downward compatible. Upgrading older projects removes all photo's: that's disaster level.

Review.Titre: The photos came quickly but in two…
Review.Contenu: The photos came quickly but in two packages which would have been good to know ahead of time as I was looking in the wrong place (small one was mailboxed).Also one of my big photos was cropped unexpectedly to cut off a good portion of my father’s head rendering it undesirable to mount and display.

Review.Titre: Happy with final product. Software could still be more flexible
Review.Contenu: Happy with final product. Would like more different templates to fit 3 to 5 pics (vertical and horizontal) in a month's page.

Review.Titre: A repeat customer.
Review.Contenu: Excellent print quality and speedy service. A good range of products. I would like more flexibility e.g. inserting single pages and a wider range of photo shapes and templates.

Review.Titre: Creating the book is very easy
Review.Contenu: Creating the book is very easy. I wasn’t home when the package arrived . It was left on my landing not my porch.  When I got home the cardboard package was soaking wet because it rained. I was fortunate that my picture book was not damaged.   Still dumbfounded why it was left on the landing.   Laziness I guess.

Review.Titre: Easy peasy photobook for a reasonable price
Review.Contenu: Pictures quality was quite good, the book seems to be durable and well put together and best of all, it's exactly as it looked on the site when I submitted it (nothing out of the margins or missing text).  Quick delivery and turnaround time but I find the shipping cost high for what was shipped.

Review.Titre: Excellent finished product
Review.Contenu: Excellent finished product! Very fast turnaround, received within plenty of time before Christmas. Online chat person let us in on generous available discount, which saved us plenty of money to make the whole experience even better. Not the first, or last time we’ll use Mimeo for our albums.

Review.Titre: Each year the product improves - one suggestion
Review.Contenu: Each year the product improves.  I have ordered 5-6 calendars for family (under different names for ease of delivery).  The only request I have, is that it would be great if the calendars could automatically refill birthdays, anniversaries, etc.   Each year it takes me a while to input them. I was glad you increased the size of the font on calendar days.

Review.Titre: 2024 calendar
Review.Contenu: 2024 calendar. Photo's perfect. Colors matched what I sent you. This is something that is not always done. I will continue doing business with you. Nothing worse than not getting what should be a no brainer, color matching. Had a problem with that with another provider. So Thank You. John

Review.Titre: Great product.
Review.Contenu: I prepared two books to capture the highlights of a recent trip to Japan. The books are beautiful. And the service was great. One book arrived slightly damaged and I was able to easily report the damage, quickly get a response and received a perfect new replacement book within a week. Wonderful!

Review.Titre: Excellent quality and customer service
Review.Contenu: I order photo books and calendars every year. They always look amazing. This year I had an issue with my photo books. Customer support responded to me very quickly and got replacements sent out right away. Very happy with how everything turned out!

Review.Titre: Been using Mimeo for several years.
Review.Contenu: Been using Mimeo annually ever since Apple stopped their App. Uploaded my calendar pictures on a Saturday and received the printed product here in Canada 9 days later. To me, this is a quick turnaround. Printed quality is excellent.

Review.Titre: Beautiful Calendars
Review.Contenu: I received my calendar order timely and they are beautiful. Using the site was fairly easy and the finished product turned out beautifully. I like that they are "individually packaged" making it easy to give as gifts. I will absolutely use this site again, and will refer to family and friends!

Review.Titre: Travel Memories I have now completed 17 travel related…
Review.Contenu: I have now completed 17 travel related books now and each was a wonderful experience to create. The grandkids frequently take time to sit down and relive the experience. I have received good value for these books but must admit that they are getting more expensive and I will have to test my pension budget against the rising cost.

Review.Titre: I've been ordering Mimeo calendars for…
Review.Contenu: I've been ordering Mimeo calendars for about 10 years and it seems to get simpler every time.  I like how easy it is to try a given photo, adjust its qualities, and then decide.  The image on my screen is well matched by what shows up in the print.

Review.Titre: My experience has been awesome from day…
Review.Contenu: My experience has been awesome from day one of using Mimeo to create my projects. I make 6 books and 4-5 calendars. Every year I learn more about your tools,  and every year I get more creative with them. It's the highlight of the holidays to watch the reactions of the recipients when they open them. Your help staff is beyond helpful...and very quickly I might add. The only improvement I could suggest is that the calendar photos are a little more contrasty than the books. I think it's due to the color saturation I like to use. Less is more on these smaller photos. I loved that I was able to make use of the multiple discounts this year. Nice Mimeo, Thank You

Review.Titre: Very easy to use and intuitive…
Review.Contenu: Very easy to use and intuitive templates that mesh easily with Apple Photos, excellent turnaround time and very good print quality. One thing that might help though would be a few more fonts

Review.Titre: I enjoy making my hard covered photo…
Review.Contenu: I enjoy making my hard covered photo albums and calendars.  The paper and print is high quality and the books are beautiful.  I always get great comments on the projects I have made from Mimeo Photos.  The shipping is fast and sent in a hard covered cardboard case.

Review.Titre: Wonderful photo books
Review.Contenu: Mimeo products are not cheap but they are of stunning and lasting quality. I've made their photobooks for years to create lasting memories. They look and feel so much superior to other products...

Review.Titre: Easy software.
Review.Contenu: Straight forward software for importing pictures and text. Quick delivery. Quality cards. Have used for Christmas cards for several years snd will continue using Mimeo

Review.Titre: Mimeo has the highest quality products…
Review.Contenu: Mimeo has the highest quality products (especially when working on iMac, MacBook & co). Easy to put together, all possibilities! The better quality also comes with a higher price. IMO it’s worth it

Review.Titre: Top-notch reproduction
Review.Contenu: We’ve been doing family calendars for years and our family members cherish each calendar as a keepsake for the year’s photos. Quality of production is top-notch!

Review.Titre: Important to know that the quality is wonderful.
Review.Contenu: Not only were they very efficient but my calendars were wonderful and in time for Christmas.  The calendars that I do every years always turn out terrific!

Review.Titre: The quality of the cards and calendars…
Review.Contenu: The quality of the cards and calendars of alwaysbeen great!The Mimeo team workers have always been veryhelpful when needed assistance in my projects. The service of receiving my cards or calendarshave been speedy.Thank you for your service.

Review.Titre: User friendly
Review.Contenu: I have been using Mineo video for at least 10 years and there have been many positive changes. I always create my own book. I can now re-arrange each page as I need to, and add pictures easily.   I only wish I could order other domestic items with pictures and not just books calendars and framed pictures.

Review.Titre: Excellent service 5 years running
Review.Contenu: I have used Mimeo to create an annual calendar for 5 years now. Every year the calendars turn out exactly how I expect! It's an easy app to use. The turnaround time is crazy fast. They usually have a holiday discount, which is really appreciated. Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: Helpful on line chat to guide me…
Review.Contenu: Helpful on line chat to guide me through designing my yearly calendar. The most tricky part was uploading and filling in the forms at the end, but I had great help from one of your guides and it all went through. I am a 77 year old granny, so I did well!The finished calendars arrived within a few days and were absolutely brilliant quality, design and value!Thanks, I will be doing them again next year.

Review.Titre: The program is user friendly.
Review.Contenu: The program is user friendly.The finished books are beautiful.Quite prohibitive for printing more than a few books

Review.Titre: I have been use MIMEO Photos for albums…
Review.Contenu: I have been use MIMEO Photos for albums for few years and I really love it so much and ordered albums for family members

Review.Titre: Mimeo is great for making books, calendars, and cards!
Review.Contenu: Quality of Mimeo products, especially their printing is excellent.  Excellent color control.  Options for books, wall calendars, and cards are great. Having ordered 30 copies of a book, quality was maintained.  On a rare occasion, a flaw in printing might happen and if so, the support team responds quickly and issues a reprint. In terms of advice to users, plan ahead so one can use economy (the least expensive) shipping. Do note that the book cost remains the same no matter how many are ordered and reductions for shipping for multiple copies are minimal.  For Mimeo, I look forward to more layout options than just for titles and captions when book requires a significant amount of text as well as photos. I was able to enter a lot of text, doing my own page design, but it was hard, for example, to keep columns of text even. But - it did work and the results were very good.

Review.Titre: Easy way to create photo books using Apple Photos
Review.Contenu: Creating the photo book using Apple Photos was easy.  The book arrived quickly, the quality is great, and the colors match the originals. The ordering process would be improved if Mimeo starts accepting Apple Pay as a form of payment.

Review.Titre: Consistently high quality photo calendars year after year
Review.Contenu: The quality of the final photo calendar was outstanding.  The photos all turned out great and the quality of the glossy paper used to make the calendar was outstanding.

Review.Titre: Photo calendar takes stress out of holiday prep
Review.Contenu: I make a family photo calendar every year. Using Mimeo with Photos on my computer makes the whole process straightforward and enjoyable. Quality is always excellent and I get my calendars promptly. Thanks for taking some stress out of my holiday prep, Mimeo!

Review.Titre: Quick and easy
Review.Contenu: Great designs. And lots of choice. Logical navigation. Fast return of product. Quality of paper. Superb colours.

Review.Titre: Choose your own format, not a pre-set one
Review.Contenu: I like the fact that I can choose to make my own format instead of having to choose one of the pre-set formats.  I like that I can put a text box with lots of text on one page and the photos can be on the opposite page.  Customer service was good.  Finished product looks classy and just how I hoped.

Review.Titre: I really love the Calendar I created
Review.Contenu: I really love the Calendar I created.  I do find the process of how to upload photos to it a little non intuitive, it's likely because I only do it once a year usually, but once I figured it out it was ok. Shipping was also prompt as usual.

Review.Titre: Probably my 10TH to 12th order from…
Review.Contenu: Probably my 10TH to 12th order from mimeocards, calanders, hard cover books. Always great quality and fast delivery

Review.Titre: QUALITY PRODUCT..
Review.Contenu: QUALITY PRODUCT... easy to use app, uploads were quick, printing and shipping were fast, no damage to calendars when they arrived, pictures were accurately reproduced...

Review.Titre: Great company
Review.Contenu: I have been using Mimeo since it first started doing business for Apple (before I knew it wasn’t even Apple making my projects. I am used to Mimeos ways of comprising projects and the products are of excellent Quality. When I have had questions it has been easy to communicate with a person for help. You have always been quick with delivery also. One year I made a book that wasn’t quite right and you corrected and shipped a corrected one out very quickly and it was my fault. My only issue is that if I make a book and cards I can’t do them on one order and combine shipping and also I can’t make 6 of something and send to different addresses without redoing each one for a separate address. Maybe there is a way but I haven’t figured it out.I would be very disappointed if I had to ding a different way to make my photo projects! I’m a loyal and happy customer.

Review.Titre: I love mimeo photos and use it for all…
Review.Contenu: I love mimeo photos and use it for all my photo books. Turn around is easy and I’m happy with the quality. Being embedded with iPhotos on the Mac makes the process so easy.

Review.Titre: The Calendar I purchased was very good…
Review.Contenu: The Calendar I purchased was very good quality and my photos were all excellent quality when printed.The service was fast and efficient.

Review.Titre: The discount for the Holidays
Review.Contenu: The discount for the Holidays! Also I had a calendar that was missing a page and you sent another one. That was great. Thank you so much.

Review.Titre: Excellent customer service
