Review.Contenu: There were some imperfections in the printing of my photobook. Mimeo took care of it right away. Final book is beautiful and a great memory of our trip.

Review.Titre: High quality products.
Review.Contenu: My calendars turned out so good! Very high quality and they are nice and big. Easy to make, though sometimes a little cumbersome when I wanted to add photos to the individual days on the calendar. I appreciate the  35% off and the shipping was quicker than expected. I will definitely make my yearly calendars again with Mimeo.

Review.Titre: A great way to make those pictures more…
Review.Contenu: A great way to make those pictures more available and useful.  Who wants to constantly look at a screen to remember the past year?  Make an annual picture book, with a layout you choose, or make a memory book of a pet lost or a family member.  They look awesome on a coffee table and your family will pick the book up and look through them on a regular basis.

Review.Titre: disappointing
Review.Contenu: My recent experience, I meant to give you one star.  It was difficult to negotiate, and $780 for eleven small soft covered albums was far too much... they look like something I paid $10 each for... very disappointing, and some of the photos in the middle of the book were cut in half.as for the $55 postage.. I felt it was overpriced and poorly executed.

Review.Titre: I made two books
Review.Contenu: I made two books.  Obviously the second one was easier than the first.  A UTube type of instructional video would be useful.

Review.Titre: Highest quality photo books and…
Review.Contenu: Highest quality photo books and calendars on the market. I have tried every company out there and have found Mimeo to produce the best products.

Review.Titre: Perfect special gift to make
Review.Contenu: I make these calendars every year for atleast 25 people. It is the best gift-as long ans you have the photos it is so easy to make and the quality is just beautiful. Thank you for your wonderful product. It truly is the best gift to make!!

Review.Titre: Quality. Efficient. Professional.
Review.Contenu: Quality is great. The packaging professional. Not having to take my projects to the post office - priceless! Production & delivery- around the world - was most efficient.

Review.Titre: Superb Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Very good customer service. The folks who assisted me helped figure out how to upload my project on a very outdated operating system and browser. It took quite some effort to identify the hang ups that my computer had, working though chat and email, as I couldn’t even upload screenshot due to the age of my software. Once we had the right method identified, everything went smoothly and the photo book looks fantastic

Review.Titre: Fantastic facility for photo albums
Review.Contenu: Really user friendly to make photo albums similar to the ones I used to make through Apple Mac. A lot of options for layout, zooming in/out, changing to black and white etc. Great quality for the finished product and rapid delivery.

Review.Titre: Sale season
Review.Contenu: I waited until the sale season to buy. This time I bought two hardbacks. I am making a book of my essays. The Japanese fonts in the current MIMEO are poor, so I create my manuscripts in Pages on my Mac and paste them as images.I have been using MIMEO since the Apple days, which is about 14-5 years now, and MIMEO is constantly being upgraded to improve its usability.I recommend MIMEO to Windows users because it has a web version as well.

Review.Titre: This application is so easy on a Mac
Review.Contenu: This application is so easy on a Mac! I can have an album on photos and go directly to the page without the hassle of downloading all the pictures first.  And I love having the options of different backgrounds.  It was so fun making my travel book! I could change picture sizes and positions  and move text boxes anywhere. Just don’t change themes in the middle of your work..

Review.Titre: Family gifts for all from Mimeo again, great quality!
Review.Contenu: For the second year in a row, I've made Family calendars with Mimeo for Christmas gifts, as well as a few book gifts for friends.The website is super easy to use, and fabulous quality.  These gifts are always well received and such treasured keepsakes for family.  The pricing is a little more expensive than some options to make books and calendars, but the quality is fantastic.

Review.Titre: Exception business & pleasure calendars!
Review.Contenu: I do all the creative work but can’t do the printing & binding for family & business calendars. Exceptional form and finish every time. Love the service and have been coming back for more over these many years!

Review.Titre: Flexible, Versatile System!!
Review.Contenu: I have been using Mimeo Photos for nearly 20 years to make a photo book of each of our vacations.  The program has continued to improve and grow through the years giving a multitude of choices with which to make great memories.  I enjoy making custom albums.  You may insert text where ever you wish, enlarge/crop/re-adjust pictures as you go.  The ability to add photos to your folder choices is great.  You may change fonts, font colors and background colors to your liking.  Being able to combine custom layouts with template layouts makes creativity shine.

Review.Titre: Great Experience
Review.Contenu: I've used Mimeo for 18+ 100 page photo albums.  This year was the best ever because I no longer need to get photos all into the same format.  Customer Service was great when I had 1 page, out of 900 total, that wasn't affixed to the book spine.  The book was immediately reprinted and sent.  I had one other "quirky" thing when I got notice I had 2 restricted photos that wouldn't be printed.  They were not.    Before I responded the book was printed and arrived in perfect order.

Review.Titre: The app is very easy to use
Review.Contenu: The app is very easy to use. The finished product is excellent, the colors are rich, nice size and make a great gift. One thing that could be improved is the wrapping and shipping. Again this year the corners of the calendars were slightly crushed, maybe using cardboard corners and wrapping in brown paper would help to better protect the product.

Review.Titre: I have always been exceptionally…
Review.Contenu: I have always been exceptionally satisfied with the Mimeo calendars. Always many compliments on the quality. Speedy product production and fast shipping. This year I tried to get a savings coupon from your web sight to save 25% -entered my email twice and never got an email back. But to show how much I am completely satisfied with your product, I ordered anyway. Pricey for a calendar so I only make one where I used to make several. $14.99 to ship a $30.00 calendar is expensive. Mimeo benefits because my recipient is worth it and it has become a traditional Christmas gift!

Review.Titre: Easy and creative product to use
Review.Contenu: The product is easy to use and I love the fact that it gives me the ability to make a very individual creation

Review.Titre: I have used Mimeo for my calendars for…
Review.Contenu: I have used Mimeo for my calendars for several years and EVERYONE that I gift them to LOVE them.

Review.Titre: Wonderful quality!
Review.Contenu: I ordered this a memory book with most of our pictures from a two week trip to Italy.  I was thrilled at the quality of every single picture.  It was incredibly easy to create, adding text where it was appropriate, and cropping and changing layouts to suit the number of photos I had.

Review.Titre: Great calendars
Review.Contenu: Easy to use platform, great printing and fast delivery. Have been using this for a few years and will continue to do so.

Review.Titre: I have been doing a photo book for many…
Review.Contenu: I have been doing a photo book for many years at Christmas time. Very pleased with the quality of the product. They are easy to assemble and quick to get back to me. Thank you, Mimeo.

Review.Titre: Our card came out exactly as we hoped
Review.Contenu: Our card came out exactly as we hoped. Excellent quality and fast service

Review.Titre: This is the 9th book I have created…
Review.Contenu: This is the 9th book I have created with Mimeo Photos.  The quality of the books is outstanding.  Even photos I was worried were not good enough turned out perfectly.  The paper used in the books is very high quality. You will not be disappointed.

Review.Titre: A Great Product Via Apple Photos
Review.Contenu: I’ve been ordering Christmas cards from Mimeo for several years and I’m very pleased with their service. I like the ability to completely personalize your product and not just being stuck with templates. Templates are available but you can customize them. Mimeo is an available extension with Apple Photos, which is what I use to design my products. Shipping and processing have always been prompt.

Review.Titre: Always excellent service and quality of…
Review.Contenu: Always excellent service and quality of product.  We have used them for years.

Review.Titre: Quick Turnaround
Review.Contenu: Fast service and shipping. FYI - your end product will reflect the work you put into it. Pay attention to all the details before ordering and your product will look great.

Review.Titre: Very professional quality
Review.Contenu: Mimeo continues to improve their product/website. It is easy to use and looks very good

Review.Titre: It usually takes a while
Review.Contenu: It usually takes a while but when I remember the steps, it is pretty easy to get everything like I want it. The cards are high quality and arrive so quickly, I am always amazed. I am proud to send them to friends and relatives.

Review.Titre: Easy to use with beautiful results!Once I got started I was able to create…
Review.Contenu: Once I got started I was able to create Holiday Greeting cards and a memory book of our vacation on my iPad! So easy, a child could do it! The finished products were beautiful!

Review.Titre: I usually enjoy using your site but…
Review.Contenu: I usually enjoy using your site but this year my computer was not working properly and I found it difficult to make the calendar. , I was not able to edit the photographs. This was nothing to do with you- it was my computer. In the past I have found your site easy to use and I have made calendar for the family every Christmas for a number of years. They have always been very professional and my family have enjoyed getting them. Is it possible to make a calendar with Mimeo photo extension on an ipad. Thanks for making all this possible

Review.Titre: Fast shipping!
Review.Contenu: Mimeo Photos makes gorgeous books and ships them so fast! Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: I love how easy it is to make calendars.
Review.Contenu: I love, love, love my experience with Mimeo Photos.  Every year I make calendars for family and friends and it is always so much fun!  It is easy and much appreciated by the recipients.  Hey, I am "80" and if I can do it, anyone can!

Review.Titre: very helpful
Review.Contenu: I couldn't upload the hole data file but the credit card account was already charged. I wrote an email to Mimeo Photos and within 30min the problem was solved.Thank you.

Review.Titre: Easy to use
Review.Contenu: If I had a question, I could usually find it in the tutorials. I emailed a few times and was answered promptly.

Review.Titre: Turned out exactly as viewed
Review.Contenu: The book turned out exactly as it looked in the software. I’m very happy with the quality.I did get a few warnings about some pictures that were low resolution, which I appreciated. So yes, those were a bit blurry but I knew they would be and it was fine.Easy tool to use. Great product. Will use again

Review.Titre: Replacement for Apple photo books
Review.Contenu: I was looking for a photobook company that I could use for my different photobook projects after Apple stopped providing their services. I am very happy with the Mimeo product and will use it again. The program is similar to the late Apple one and is easy to work with. Upload and purchase were easy, and the production time was very reasonable. My only advice is to make it clearer that Mimeo is filling Apple's shoes. I do not know what is possible legally, but it was not 100% clear to me before I started to build my project. I would spend more time on my review if the request would come from Mimeo directly. I know the Truspoint is legitimate, but it is not the same.

Review.Titre: Product quality (calendars) is…Excellent
Review.Contenu: Product quality (calendars) is excellent. Service was quick and I received happy responses from everyonewho I had gifted a calendar. This a yearly ritual andMimeo always comes through.

Review.Titre: Calendars were beautiful and arrived…
Review.Contenu: Calendars were beautiful and arrived when expected! Thank you. Cost is getting a bit higher!!

Review.Titre: Problem with first Order without discount
Review.Contenu: I placed my first order on Mimeo but unfortunately forgot to fill in the discount. That‘s why I started to chat with a really friendly and patiently person who helped me during the whole uploading process. Thanks a lot for your great help :)

Review.Titre: The quality was even better than I…
Review.Contenu: The quality was even better than I expected! Everyone who looks at the book wants to know what company I used. Truly, this really did surpass my expectations! I will definitely be using Mimeo again.

Review.Titre: The quality is always great
Review.Contenu: The quality is always great. The service as well. My only issue is with the high cost of shipping.

Review.Titre: The product that was produced was…
Review.Contenu: The product that was produced was beautiful. Excellent workmanship and good turn around time. I was truly impressed by the quality.

Review.Titre: Beautiful high quality photo book and…
Review.Contenu: Beautiful high quality photo book and easy to use software.  I appreciated being able to relocate individual rather than double pages which is an improvement in the software.

Review.Titre: Great experience overall
Review.Contenu: Great experience overall. The final result was a great book of memories

Review.Titre: Love how easy this site is to make…
Review.Contenu: Love how easy this site is to make beautiful memories come to life! I wish my older books I made didn’t have so many errors ending in all my work erasing…

Review.Titre: It was fairly easy to work with
Review.Contenu: It was fairly easy to work with. I hope my kids love the calendars If they do, I’ll be back next year.

Review.Titre: I have been very happy with the…
Review.Contenu: I have been very happy with the calendars that I have created each year since 2011 however this year it came with out an envelope. I post the calendars to my family for Christmas and the envelope has made posting easier because it protects the calendar and also makes it easier to wrap. I had to get creative with a plastic folder this year which was not as satisfying. I expect my family to keep the calendars because they contain the family history. I miss the envelope. Thank you

Review.Titre: I really like 1) the compatibility with…
Review.Contenu: I really like 1) the compatibility with Apple Photo, 2) that I can produce PDF copies to review and proof read my project, 3) the quality of the printed book

Review.Titre: A travels book completes the Trip
Review.Contenu: A photo book completes the Trip!  With digital photography, it's so easy to gather thousands of images, but they get lost in our laptops.  The act of creating a Mimeo book encourages curation of the best images needed to tell a story.  I really enjoy sharing the images in a high-quality book format and it's so engaging and longer-lasting than a quickly-shown "slide show" from the phone or laptop.

Review.Titre: Mimeo gets a high rating
Review.Contenu: They have greatly simplified the process to make a book and they respond quickly to tech help questions. They have also shortened the production time.

Review.Titre: Love Mimeo Photos
Review.Contenu: Each time I use Mimeo Photos it's easier.  The latest update made the project better than ever and the final product is beautiful.Every year, two family calendars are created. All really enjoy the shared memories.

Review.Titre: The Mimeo tool is very easy to use
Review.Contenu: The Mimeo tool is very easy to use.  It was very convenient to build my Mimeo book inside of the iPhoto's app on my MAC.  The tool is user friendly.  The end product looked amazing!  It was delivered very fast.  The recipient of my photo project loved it!  Great experience and will use again.

Review.Titre: Very good service
Review.Contenu: Very good service. I made a mistake related to an order/purchase, which Mimeo sorted out quickly for me. I have used Mimeo Photos several years for both photo books, but mainly annual calendars. It is easy to make books/calenders and the result printed quiality is very good.

Review.Titre: I experienced fast and accurate service…
Review.Contenu: I experienced fast and accurate service generating 100 or so Christmas cards, with text and a photo.

Review.Titre: Great
Review.Contenu: Great, quality printing and book layouts!

Review.Titre: The Christmas cards I designed were…
Review.Contenu: The Christmas cards I designed were printed on very high quality card stock. My order was delivered quickly. My only negative was the price really went up this year.

Review.Titre: Calendar
Review.Contenu: Calendar was easy to put together and the quality it beautiful.

Review.Titre: Your ordering site is easy to navigate
Review.Contenu: Your ordering site is easy to navigate, your production and delivery time is quite fast and your photo and packaging for the calendar is excellent

Review.Titre: A great quality product!
Review.Contenu: The whole procedure is quite complicated for a 77 year old granny, but with great back up and online chat from Ashmir, I managed to produce my yearly calendar as before, incorporating all my grandchildren, family, cats, dogs, etc! I needed help with the final uploading which he provided, and within three days, my 12 calendars arrived, all perfect, beautifully packaged and presented..really recommended for a very professional and good quality product..thank you all at Mimeo!

Review.Titre: Suggestions
Review.Contenu: Your product is excellent. Two suggestions: (1) allow for more precise spacing between pictures on a spread. I make all my books starting with a blank template. My books end up with pages where the spacing between photos is inconsistent. I would like to have more ability to adjust spacing on a spread. (2) I would like to have the option of adding page numbers.

Review.Titre: I love the different ways you can add…
Review.Contenu: I love the different ways you can add text to the photo book pages.Once i figured it out it was so greatWish they had more background options but other than that I love it

Review.Titre: Best Printing Service
Review.Contenu: I've been a Mimeo customer for years and am still happy with its professional quality books and calendars, its reliable and quick service.
